title: All prints of iconic northeast films ‘Joymoti’ & ‘Indramalati’ lost
content: Guwahati: The original prints of the historic Assamese film ‘ Joymoti ’, which is the first known film of the northeast and directed by the legendary cultural icon of Assam, Jyoti Prasad Agarwala , could not withstand the onslaught of time and has ceased to exist due to lack of preservation efforts. Not only for ‘Joymoti’, but the original reels of ‘ Indramalati ’, Agarwala’s second film also fades into oblivion. title: Chrome on #android can read webpages out loud from within the app
creator: bfadmin
content: Google is rolling out a new option called “Listen to this page” that can read a webpage out loud to you from within the Android Chrome browser. The feature comes with playback controls similar to those you’d find in music or podcast players, letting you pause, change the reading speed, scrub forward, or skip ahead or back by 10 seconds at a time. You can also change the voice it uses, as well as the language. The feature supports several, including English, French, German, Arabic, Hindi, and...

title: Fuerte lluvia y viento azota Coatepec y deja daños en vía pública
creator: hilda
content: Agencia de Noticias RTV, 16 de junio de 2024 Coatepec, Ver.- Tras la fuerte lluvia y viento registrada este domingo, se reportan algunas afectaciones en el municipio de Coatepec. Árboles caídos, espectaculares derribados en la vía pública y algunos cortes en el suministro de energía eléctrica se presentaron. PC Municipal atiende los daños registrados en el Pueblo Mágico.

title: Gündelik kahve keyfi Parkinson'dan koruyabilir mi?
content: 184 bin kişi üzerinde 13 yıl boyunca yapılan geniş çaplı bir araştırma, tüketenlerin Parkinson hastalığına yakalanma olasılığının daha düşük olduğunu gösterdi. Kafein ve Parkinson ilişkisi: Bilimsel kanıtlar güçleniyor Uluslararası bir araştırma ekibi, Parkinson hastalarının kafein metabolitleri olan paraxanthine ve theophylline seviyelerini inceleyerek, kahve tüketiminin Parkinson riskini azalttığını tespit etti. title: Foto real ganha prêmio em categoria de imagens feitas com IA e é desqualificada

title: 中国吉林省の長白山世界ジオパークが開園
content: 【6月17日 Xinhua News】中国吉林省の長白山保護開発区で14日に観光開発会議の開幕式が行われ、長白山世界ジオパークの正式開園が発表された。「中国東北部の屋根」と称される長白山が世界レベルの観光地として一歩を記した。 アジア大陸東岸に位置する同山は北東アジア大陸で最も高い山系であり、生態系を守る重要な役割を果たしている。国連教育科学文化機関(ユネスコ)が設けた認定機関、世界ジオパークネットワークは3月、中国が推薦した長白山地質公園を世界ジオパークに認定した。 長白山世界ジオパークは吉林省南東部に位置し、2723・8平方キロの面積を持つ。第四紀火山活動によって形成された地形を特徴とし、東アジアで火山が最も多く、火山の密度が最も高く、火山岩が最も広く分布する地域となっているほか、アジアで最も標高が高く最大の火口湖もある。...

title: イスラエル軍がガザ地区南部の幹線道路での軍事活動を一時停止と発表 国防相は戦闘の一時停止把握なし・政府も措置を承認せず
content: イスラエル軍は16日、人道支援物資の搬入を増やすため、ガザ地区南部の幹線道路で軍事活動を一時停止したと発表しました。 イスラエル軍の発表によりますと、軍事活動の一時停止は15日から午前8時から午後7時までの11時間、物資の搬入経路となっている南部ケレム・シャローム検問所からハンユニスにつながる幹線道路沿いで行われています。 イスラエル軍は、国際司法裁判所がガザ地区への支援物資を増やすよう命じたことなどを受けた措置だとしています。 一方で地元メディアによると、ガラント国防相が戦闘の一時停止を聞いていないほか、政府も今回の措置を承認していないとして、実際に戦闘の一時停止が行われているかは不明です。 UNRWA=国連パレスチナ難民救済機関は15日、「5万人以上の子どもが栄養不良で治療を必要としている」と食糧不足の深刻さを訴えています。 フジテレビ報道局が全国、世界の重要ニュースから身近な話題まで様々な情報を速報・詳報含めて発信します。...

title: Машина вылетела на тротуар в центре Читы
creator: Александр Хамраев
content: Автомобиль вылетел на тротуар на улице Бутина в центре Читы после столкновения вечером 16 июня, сообщил корреспонденту «Чита.Ру» очевидец. Авария произошла недалеко от здания налоговой, машина вылетела к дому Бутина, 31. По данным Госавтоинспекции, ДТП произошло в 21:50, столкнулись две легковые машины Toyota Vanguard и Mazda. title: Bellingham gets unconvincing England off to winning Euros start
content: GELSENKIRCHEN (Germany), June 17 — Jude Bellingham got England’s Euro 2024 campaign off to a winning start but a 1-0 victory over Serbia in Gelsenkirchen failed to dispel doubts over the Three Lions’ quest to become European champions for the first time. Bellingham was in a class of his own in Gelsenkirchen as the Real Madrid midfielder’s header on 13 minutes capped a fine individual display. title: DeChambeau sikret sin andre US Open-seier på siste hull
content: McIlroy var i poengrommet da DeChambeau satte den siste seieren og slapp jubelen løs for seieren. Amerikaneren fullførte turneringen sju slag under par. title: Swedish officials say weak replacement parts caused a fatal roller coaster derailment last year
content: COPENHAGEN, Denmark -- Swedish accident investigators on Friday said the country's oldest amusement park didn't properly test new parts for a roller coaster that derailed last year and sent some passengers plunging to the ground, killing one and injuring nine others, one seriously. title: 日本遊注意 賈新興:九州及四國梅雨鋒面影響有大雷雨
content: 到 日本 旅遊要注意了,台灣整合防災工程技術顧問公司總監賈新興今早在臉書表示,旅遊的朋友要特別留意 梅雨 鋒面的影響,特別是九州及四國一帶。 日本氣象廳指出,今天受梅雨鋒面影響,九州南部大氣非常不穩定,恐有 大雷雨 ;到了傍晚,大雷雨範圍會擴大到日本中國、四國及近畿地方,到了深夜,東海地方也會下雨。

title: Between hollow rhetoric and war: how sanctions work – and why they often don’t
creator: Julian Borger World affairs editor
content: I n the year 432BCE, the Athenian empire sought to teach its smaller neighbour, Megara, a punitive lesson after various acts of defiance. Instead of going to war, which would break the peace with Sparta, Athens took the novel path of blocking the Megarians from using all the ports in the region. It was known as the Megarian decree, and it was arguably the first recorded case of economic sanctions. It was also a failure, at least when it came to fending off a conflict. title: Altuve la sacó en la victoria de Astros (+video)
creator: Fabiana Dos Reis
content: El dominicano Ronel Blanco consiguió su segunda apertura sin hits en su corta carrera en las Grandes Ligas, pero fue retirado luego de siete episodios en el triunfo de Astros de Houston sobre Tigres de Detroit, 4-1 el domingo. Blanco (7-2), quien lanzó el único juego sin hits en las mayores esta temporada el 1 de abril ante Toronto, fue igual de rutilante esta ocasión — en su 20ma apertura y 37ma aparición de su carrera. title: Avance histórico: La primera presidenta mujer de México y la igualdad de género, según el IMEF
content: El presidente del Instituto Mexicano de Ejecutivos de Finanzas (IMEF) , José Domingo Figueroa, resaltó el acontecimiento histórico que representa la elección de la primera mujer como presidenta de México . Este evento marca un paso importante hacia la igualdad de oportunidades en el país. Domingo Figueroa subrayó la elección como un símbolo de los avances logrados en materia de equidad de género , pero también como un recordatorio de los retos que aún persisten en este ámbito. title: Ayo Edebiri's 'Inside Out 2' Smashes Box Office with $155 Million Opening
creator: TMZ Staff
content: Ayo Edebiri might play Envy in "Inside Out 2," but she's not jealous of any other movie's box office -- 'cause her new movie smashed its opening weekend. The much-anticipated Pixar sequel outperformed expectations this weekend by a mile ... raking in $155 million domestically and $140 million internationally for a grand total of $295 million -- the second-largest animated opening ever. It's also the biggest opening weekend for any movie this year and the first film to open at above $100 million...

title: 2 killed as car rams SUV in Puttur
content: Mangaluru : Two persons died in an accident reported at Shekamale in Puttur Rural police limits on Sunday. As per preliminary information received, the deceased are Lokesh and Ravindra, who were travelling in a car. According to police, the accident occurred when the car driver, attempting to avoid hitting a two-wheeler at Shekamale, veered to the extreme right and collided with an SUV coming from the opposite direction. The car was moving from Mangaluru to Madikeri, while the SUV was traveling...

title: Ahamdiyya,his sacrificial animal detained in Pakistan
content: Amritsar: Ahead of the Eid festival , police in Pakistan not only detained an Ahmadi but also confiscated his sacrificial animal (goat), preventing him from performing 'qurbani' (sacrifice), as Ahmadis have been declared non-Muslims in Pakistan. An Ahmadi source in Pakistan said Qaiser Imran of Daska, was detained by police following a complaint that he had brought a goat for ‘qurbani’ following which the Sialkot deputy commissioner ordered detaining Quaiser for seven days under the provisions...

title: Dementer Inzest-Täter Fritzl will nicht entmündigt werden
content: Er hatte seine Tochter 24 Jahre lang im Keller eingesperrt und tausendfach vergewaltigt. Dafür wurde Josef Fritzl zu lebenslanger Haft verurteilt. Nun wehrt sich der 89-Jährige gegen einen Vormund – trotz Wahnvorstellungen.

title: Biden fundraises in California as Trump rallies in Detroit
content: Biden fundraises in California as Trump rallies in Detroit President Biden attended a star-studded fundraiser in California over the weekend. Meanwhile, former president Trump held a rally in Detroit. Skyler Henry reports.

title: Lula dice que las guerras de Ucrania y Gaza se deben a la «fragilidad» de la ONU
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, ITALIA. – El presidente brasileño, Luis Inazio Lula, aseguró este sábado que las guerras de Ucrania y Gaza se deben «en gran parte a la fragilidad» de la ONU, que, si asumiera un «papel de neutralidad en busca de un acuerdo, posiblemente» ya se estaría negociando la paz. «Lo que está ocurriendo en Ucrania y en la Franja de Gaza es en gran parte por la fragilidad del papel de las Naciones Unidas», porque «si los países que componen el Consejo de Seguridad asumieran el...

title: வீட்டில் தனியாக இருந்த இளம்பெண்ணுக்கு பாலியல் தொல்லை கொடுத்த நபர் கைது
creator: தினத்தந்தி
content: சென்னை, சென்னையை அடுத்த ஆதம்பாக்கம், பாரத் நகர் பகுதியை சேர்ந்தவர் சங்கர் (வயது 44). இவருக்கு சொந்தமான போரூர் அடுத்த சேக்மான்யம், அலங்கார் தெருவில் உள்ள வீட்டில் 35 வயது இளம்பெண் ஒருவர் தனது குடும்பத்துடன் வசித்து வந்தார். இந்தநிலையில் வீ்ட்டில் தனியாக இருந்த இளம்பெண்ணிடம், சங்கர் பாலியல் தொல்லையில் ஈடுபட்டதாக கூறப்படுகிறது. அதிர்ச்சி அடைந்த இளம்பெண் கூச்சலிட்டார். சத்தம் கேட்டு அக்கம் பக்கத்தினர் ஓடிவந்தனர். உடனே சங்கர், இதுபற்றி யாரிடமும் சொல்லக்கூடாது என இளம்பெண்ணை மிரட்டி விட்டு...

title: Deslizamiento de tierra cobra la vida de adolescente en zona rural de Valledupar
creator: Periodista
content: En la finca La Esperanza, ubicada en la vereda Sabanita, zona rural de Azúcar Buena, corregimiento de Valledupar, perdió la vida trágicamente un adolescente de 16 años identificado como Luis Daniel Herrera Carvajal, de forma accidental por el desprendimiento de tierra. title: KFDC head directs to expedite jetty project
content: Mangaluru : The Karnataka Fisheries Development Corporation (KFDC) chairperson Mala B Narayana Rao, directed officials to expedite the work of developing a floating jetty for traditional boats . Rao was speaking after inspecting the fisheries port, diesel bunks, and ice plants in Mangaluru on Saturday. After inspecting the work on the floating jetty, which is being developed by the KFDC to anchor traditional boats, she directed officials to accelerate the work to facilitate the fishermen. Rao...

title: Около 16 тысяч турков пострадали при жертвоприношениях в Курбан-байрам
creator: Виктория  Мельникова
content: Жители Турции получили порезы во время жертвоприношений в первый день мусульманского праздника Курбан-байрам. Информацию озвучил глава Министерства здравоохранения страны Фахреттин Коджа на своей странице в социальной сети Х* (бывшая Twitter). По его словам, пострадали не менее 16 тысяч человек. title: В МИД Индии объяснили, почему страна не подписала декларацию Саммита мира
content: Индия не поставила подпись под совместным документом на Саммите мира, поскольку считает, что к крепкому миру могут привести "только те варианты, которые приемлемы для обеих сторон". Об этом сообщает РБК-Украина со ссылкой на сайт Министерства иностранных дел Индии. "По нашему мнению, только те варианты, которые приемлемы для обеих сторон, могут привести к крепкому миру. Согласно этому подходу, мы решили избегать связей с общим коммюнике или каким-либо другим документом, вытекающим из этого...

title: У МЗС Індії пояснили, чому країна не підписала декларацію Саміту миру
content: Індія не поставила підпис під спільним документом на Саміті миру, оскільки вважає, що до міцного миру можуть призвести "тільки ті варіанти, які є прийнятними для обох сторін". Про це повідомляє РБК-Україна з посиланням на сайт Міністерства закордонних справ Індії. "На нашу думку, тільки ті варіанти, які є прийнятними для обох сторін, можуть призвести до міцного миру. Відповідно до цього підходу, ми вирішили уникати зв'язків із загальним комюніке або будь-яким іншим документом, що випливає...

title: BJP threatens economic blockade from June 23
content: Chatra: BJP has announced an economic blockade from June 23 if the power supply from NTPC to Tandwa does not commence. Ramdeo Singh Bhogta, the district BJP president, stated that the entire district is experiencing an unprecedented water and electricity crisis. “The decision to launch an economic blockade, which would stop coal-laden trucks from leaving the area, was made to address this issue,” he said. Bhogta said Tandwa receives power supply from the Bukru power station through Kharkhand...

title: নেপালের বিপক্ষে টস হেরে ব্যাটিংয়ে বাংলাদেশ
content: সুপার এইট নিশ্চিত করতে সেন্ট ভিনসেন্টে নেপালের মুখোমুখি হয়েছে বাংলাদেশ। এই ম্যাচ জিতলে কোনো ধরনের সমীকরণ ছাড়াই সেরা আটে জায়গা পেয়ে যাবে টাইগাররা। অপ্রত্যাশিতভাবে বড় ব্যবধানে হেরে গেলে নাজমুল হোসেনের দলকে তাকিয়ে থাকতে হবে নেদারল্যান্ডসের ম্যাচের দিকে। নেপালের বিপক্ষে গ্রুপ পর্বের শেষ ম্যাচে টস ভাগ্য পক্ষে আসেনি বাংলাদেশের।সোমবার (১৭ জুন) সেন্ট ভিনসেন্টের আর্নস ভ্যালে স্টেডিয়ামে বাংলাদেশের বিপক্ষে টসে জিতে ফিল্ডিংয়ের সিদ্ধান্ত নিয়েছে নেপাল। এই ম্যাচের একাদশে কোন বদল আনেনি বাংলাদেশ।...

title: Rain falls while donations pour in at Kelowna Father's Day car show
creator: Brittany Webster
content: The wet weather didn't deter families from showing up to CSN Collision's annual Father's Day car show in Kelowna. City Park was packed with cars and umbrellas on June 16 as hundreds of people showed up to peruse the vehicles, check out some local vendors, and grab a bite to eat at one of the food trucks. The annual event serves as a fundraiser for the Child and Youth Advocacy Centre. Executive Director Ginny Becker said the event has raised over $200,000 for the centre over the years. Becker...

title: 'Profound shock': Tributes flow for Chch e-scooter victim
content: Daniel Liesy. Photo: Gofundme Daniel Liesy died after his e-scooter collided with a pole at the intersection of Brougham St and Waltham Rd in Sydenham about 11pm. content: කොළොන්නාව බාලිකා විදුහලේ ඉගෙනුම ලැබූ හංසනී ඔල්ගා ජයවීර නමැති 14 හැවිරිදි දියණිය ජලභීතිකාව උණ වැලඳී මියගොස් තිබේ. ඇය පාරේ සිටින බලු පැටවකු නිවසට ගෙනවිත් මාස එකහමාරක් පමණ නිවසේ තබාගෙන ඉන්න අතරේ බලු සුරතලා මියගොස් ඇත. ඒ මියගිහින් මාසයකට පමණ පසු හංසනී ඔල්ගා දියණිය ජලභීතිකාව උණ වැලඳී මියගියාය. ඇයට අත්වූ විපත්ති නිසා කොළොන්නාවේ ප්‍රදේශවාසී ජනතාව දැඩි ලෙස කම්පාවට පත්ව සිටියි. දෙමාපියනි, ගෙදර සිටින සුරතලා මියගියහොත් අසනීප වුණොත් ඒ ගැන වැඩියෙන් සෝදිසි කරන්නැයි වෛද්‍යවරු දෙමාපියන්ගෙන්...

title: Англия установила уникальный рекорд групповых стадий Евро
content: В воскресенье, 16 июня, в 1-м туре групповой стадии чемпионата Европы 2024 отношения выяснили сборные Сербии и Англии, которые играют в группе С. Матч завершился со счетом 1:0 в пользу англичан . Переиграв сербов без пропущенных голов, сборная Англии на групповых стадиях Евро победила в пятом матче подряд с сухим счетом. Подобный результат ранее в истории еще никогда не встречался. В матче 3-го тура группового этапа Евро-2016 англичане сыграла вничью со Словакией (0:0). После этого на...

title: 胡歌宣传影片“滤镜开太大” 本尊吐槽:背景变形了
content: 中国男星胡歌以其帅气外型和精湛演技,赢得了广泛的赞誉和喜爱,出道多年,男神地位依然稳固。然而,16日他为上海国际电影节拍摄的宣传影片公开后,却因过度使用瘦脸滤镜引发了热议。 胡歌近日为上海国际电影节拍摄了一支宣传影片,并于16日在腾讯视频官方账号上发布。然而,视频中胡歌的脸部和五官明显变形,背景墙也出现了明显的歪曲和扭曲现象,明显是美颜开太大。 面对这一意外情况,胡歌本人也忍不住发声吐槽。他在转发影片时幽默地问道:“请问这是什么滤镜?背景都变形了!”对此,腾讯视频的官方账号回应道:“我们爱哥爱到了变形!”胡歌则接著表示:“是我幸福到了变形。”这一互动引得网民纷纷评论:“你都变外星人了”、“长得好看的人用滤镜就会变得很奇怪”、“你终于意识到你生图最好看了”、“开了瘦脸吧”。 胡歌与腾讯视频的互动引发了大票网友的讨论,大家对滤镜的使用问题发表了各自的看法。有人调侃道:“胡歌的颜值本身就很高,不需要滤镜来修饰。”也有人指出:“过度依赖滤镜反而会弄巧成拙,让人显得不自然。”更多人则是被胡歌的幽默和自嘲逗乐,认为他的回应非常可爱且真实。

title: Potential for snow remains from Hope to Kootenay Pass after weekend snowfall (Oliver/Osoyoos)
content: Photo: Ron Hiller, Facebook Potential for snowfall remains from Hope to Kootenay Pass as unseasonably large snowflakes were captured falling 20 minutes east of Osoyoos over the weekend. On Saturday morning, snowflakes large enough to cause a pelting sound were seen and heard as weather alerts were in place for drivers in mountain pass areas. According to an Environment Canada alert around 5 a.m. Sunday, there was a potential for snow from Hope to Kootenay Pass over the weekend and into Monday...

title: Pilgrims commence the final rites of Haj as Muslims celebrate Id al-Adha
content: Masses of pilgrims on June 16 embarked on a symbolic stoning of the devil in Saudi Arabia under the soaring summer heat . The ritual marks the final days of the Haj, or Islamic pilgrimage, and the start of the Id al-Adha celebrations for Muslims around the world. The stoning is among the final rites of the Haj, which is one of the Five Pillars of Islam. It came a day after more than 1.8 million pilgrims congregated at a sacred hill, known as Mount Ararat, outside the holy city of Mecca, which...

title: 랄랄의 당당한 만삭화보...상의 던진 파격 포즈
creator: 기정아 (kki@etoday.co.kr)
기정아
content: 유튜버 랄랄이 당당한 만삭 화보를 공개했다. 랄랄은 15일 자신의 인스타그램에 에 “출산까지 한 달”이라는 글과 함께 만삭 화보를 올렸다. 공개된 사진 속 랄랄은 붉은색 드레스를 입고 D라인을 드러냈다. 상의를 입지 않고, 머리카락으로 손으로 신체 일부를 가리는 포즈도 있었다. 한편, 랄랄은 140만 구독자를 보유한 유튜버다. 2월 11세 연상의 남편과 결혼 및 임신 사실을 공개했고, 남편과 함께한 수중 만삭 촬영 사진을 공개하기도...

title: කේරළ ගංජා කිලෝ 18 ක් සමග කයිට්ස් හිදී ජාවාරම්කරු මාට්ටු
creator: Rashi
content: කේරළ ගංජා කිලෝ ග්‍රෑම් 18 ක් සන්තකයේ තබා ගනිමින් ජාවාරම් කිරීම සඳහා සුදානම්ව සිටි පුද්ගලයකු යාපනයේදී විශේෂ කාර්ය බළකා නිලධාරීන්ගේ අත්අඩංගුවට පත්වී ඇත. පෙරේදා (15දා) කයිට්ස් පොලිස් වසමේ අල්ලපිඩ්ඩි හංදිය අසලදී විශේෂ කාර්ය බළකාය සිදුකළ වැටලීමකදී මෙම අත්අඩංගුවට ගැනීම සිදුකර තිබේ. එහිදී කේරළ ගංජා කිලෝ ග්‍රෑම් 18 ග්‍රෑම් 200 ක් සන්තකයේ තබාගෙන සිටි කයිට්ස් ප්‍රදේශයේ පදිංචි වයස අවුරුදු 24 ක පුද්ගලයකු අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන වැඩිදුර විමර්ශන කටයුතු සඳහා කයිට්ස් පොලිස් ස්ථානය වෙත භාරදී ඇත....

title: Jakhar slams CM over drug deaths
content: Chandigarh: Expressing anguish over 14 deaths from drug abuse in the state during the last 14 days, Punjab BJP president Sunil Jakhar has urged CM Bhagwant Mann to wake up from deep slumber and “act tough” to save the youth from the menace. Jakhar said Punjab was in the grip of drug mafia and this was happening under the full control and guidance of the AAP regime, which today “lies exposed before all Punjabis”. Punjab expects from its CM “governance and not gimmicks”, he said. Jakhar said...

title: ソフィア・コッポラとのコラボ限定リップも登場。プレミアムスキンケアブランド、アウグスティヌス バーダーが日本に本格上陸
creator: MANAMI REN
content: 手術をせずに火傷の自然修復を促進する画期的な創傷用のジェルを開発した、幹細胞生物学と再生医療の世界的な権威と知られるアウグスティヌス・バーダー教授。彼の治癒能力に関する研究と深い知識に基づいた画期的な独自技術を採用し、2018年に教授の名前を冠したプレミアム ブランド、アウグスティヌス バーダー(AUGUSTINUS BADER)が誕生。アイコニックな青いボトルの は瞬く間に高い評価を受け、数々の名だたる アワードを受賞するほど。フランス・を象徴する歴史的建造物、パレ・ロワイヤルに旗艦店を構え、現在ではスキンケアをはじめ、 や など3つのカテゴリーで約50アイテムを取り揃えている。 世界中のセレブリティにも愛され、多くのラブコールを受けて期間限定の 製品も毎年展開しているという。今年は 監督 とのコラボレーションが実現し、健やかになろうとする力に寄り添うブランド独自の技術を採用したティントタイプのリップバームをクリエイト。ソフィアが愛用しているアウグスティヌス...

title: Ульянов заявил о встревоженности стран ядерной риторикой после заявлений США
content: МОСКВА, 17 июня. /ТАСС/. РФ видит обеспокоенность некоторых стран ядерной риторикой, которая существенно усилилась на фоне заявлений США об изменениях в ядерной стратегии. Об этом заявил постоянный представитель РФ при международных организациях в Вене Михаил Ульянов в интервью " Известиям ". Ранее представитель Белого дома объявил , что США вносят коррективы в свою ядерную стратегию, ужесточая ее в отношении России и Китая, и допустил расширение американского ядерного арсенала. creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, संभल
content: जुनावई (संभल)। गुन्नौर के असदपुर में गंगा दशहरा पर स्नान करने गए धनारी के गांव अकबराबाद के एक ही परिवार के चार युवक गंगा में बह गए। शोर सुनकर आसपास के लोगों ने दो युवकों को बचा लिया, जबकि अकबराबाद गांव निवासी बबलू (19) और लोकेश (19) की डूबकर मौत हो गई। शव मिलने के बाद परिजनों ने पोस्टमार्टम कराने से इन्कार कर दिया। धनारी थाना क्षेत्र के अकबराबाद गांव के एक ही परिवार के राहुल कुमार (18), सतेंद कुमार (20) और बबलू (19) और लोकेश (19) रविवार की सुबह करीब साढ़े 11 बजे बाइकों से स्नान करने के लिए...

title: Physicists suggest a way to achieve "warp drive"
content: A team of researchers led by Mexican physicist Miguel Alcubierre has proposed new theoretical models for a warp drive that could enable high-speed subluminal travel, addressing previous challenges related to exotic matter and negative energy requirements. The original concept of the Alcubierre warp drive, introduced in 1994 and inspired by Star Trek, involved distorting spacetime to allow faster-than-light travel, but it required exotic matter with negative mass, which posed conceptual and...

content: Flere atommakter oppdaterer sitt arsenal, og i rapporten som ble lagt fram av det svenske instituttet natt til mandag, oppfordrer forskerne verdens ledere til å «ta ett skritt tilbake og reflektere». Sipri påpeker også at diplomatiske forsøk på å kontrollere kjernefysiske våpen er satt kraftig tilbake parallelt med økt internasjonal spenning, blant annet i forbindelse med krigene i Ukraina og Gaza. – Vi har ikke sett en så fremtredende rolle for atomvåpen i internasjonale forbindelse...

title: Varanasi Sports:विधि बनी रैपिड शतरंज की चैपिंयन
content: कौशांबी में आयोजित आरएम गर्ग स्मृति रैपिड शतरंज प्रतियोगिता में वाराणसी की विधि एंजेलिना सर्वाधिक अंक हासिल कर चैपिंयन बनी है। वाराणसी जिला शतरंज संघ के सदस्य विनीत राज तिवारी बताया कि बालिका वर्ग के फाइनल में विधि ने हिंडाल्को की प्रिया यादव को हराकर टॉफी पर कब्जा जमाया। वरिष्ठ वर्ग में प्रखर पांडेय को छठा स्थान हासिल मिला। बताया कि अंडर-13 आयुवर्ग में प्रदेश चैपिंयन विधि एंजेलिना पूरे लय में हैं। वह लागातर राष्ट्रीय और प्रदेशिक प्रतियोगिताओं में बेहतर प्रदर्शन कर रही हैं।

title: Mexico: Travelers from 177 nations crossed country to reach US
content: MEXICO CITY, June 17 — Around 1.39 million people from 177 countries travelled through Mexico so far this year trying to reach the United States without entry papers, the Mexican government said yesterday. The vast majority were men or women traveling alone, while almost 3,000 were unaccompanied minors, the National Migration Institute said, providing figures for January through the end of May.

title: 78-year-old moderately injured in explosion at a home in Petah Tikva

content: ليست فلسطينوحدها التي تعاني تلك الظروف المعيشية بالغة الصعوبة منذ طوفان الأقصى وما قبلهابعدة سنوات، بل تمتد المعاناة إلى البلدان العربية التي تعاني من حروب أهلية مثلالسودان واليمن وليبيا وسوريا، وإلى البلدان التي تعاني ظروفا اقتصادية وسياسيةصعبة في مصر ولبنان وتونس وغيرها، والنتيجة أننا بصدد شعوب أنهكتها المتاعبالمعيشية، الأمر الذي أضعف من قدرتها على الثورة ضد الأنظمة الاستبدادية التيتحكمها. ومن هنا، فإنمناسبات الأعياد كعيد الأضحى تثير المواجع والأسى أكثر مما تبعث على مشاعر الفرحة...

title: ضربوه حتى الموت.. وفاة حاكم مدينة ومرشح للانتخابات في منغوليا
content: توفي مرشح للانتخابات البرلمانية في منغوليا بعد تعرضه للضرب حتى الموت، وفق بيان الشرطة الأحد الذي نقلته فرانس برس. وقالت الشرطة في بيان إن الضحية الذي لم تكشف هويته كان عضوا في الحزب الديموقراطي وحاكم منطقة سانت سوم بوسط منغوليا. وأوضح بيان الشرطة، أن الرجل قُتل السبت لكن لم يتم توضيح الظروف المحيطة بالاعتداء الذي تعرض له، في حين ذكرت وسائل إعلام محلية أن الرجل يدعى ب. بيانمونخ، في حين عرفه بيان صادر عن حزبه باسم "بي بي". اظهار أخبار متعلقة من جانبه قال الحزب الديمقراطي إنه يشعر بالحزن...

title: "ظلم وكراهية".. معاناة مسلمي مدينة نيس الفرنسية تتفاقم في عيد الأضحى
content: عبر المسلمون في مدينة نيس الفرنسية عن شعورهم بالإحباط والحزن بسبب الخطابات السياسية المتهجمة والضغوط المستمرة التي يواجهونها منذ أشهر. ونقلت وكالة فرانس برس عن عثمان عيساوي إمام الجامع في المدينة التي يعيش فيها نحو 20 ألف مسلم، وهو رئيس اتحاد مسلمي منطقة جبال الألب البحرية قوله، "نشعر كأننا لسنا مواطنين كاملين". وكشف عيساوي عن أفعال معادية للإسلام في المدارس الثانوية والجامعات، وعن النظرة السلبية إلى المحجبات، وعمليات التفتيش بدون سابق إنذار في المساجد، مضيفا "نشعر بهذا هنا أكثر من...

title: В НАТО заявили об обсуждении приведения ядерного оружия к боеготовности
creator: Лилия Пашкова
content: В Североатлантическом альянсе обсуждают вопрос о том, чтобы привести ядерные ракеты в состояние боевой готовности в рамках ядерного сдерживания из-за растущих угроз со стороны России и Китая, заявил в интервью газете Telegraph генсек НАТО Йенс Столтенберг. «Я не буду вдаваться в оперативные подробности о том, сколько ядерных боеголовок должно быть в состоянии боеготовности и какие должны храниться, но нам нужно проконсультироваться по этим вопросам. Это именно то, что мы делаем», — сказал он....

title: Man claiming plot to kill CM Yogi arrested
content: Kanpur: A man who had posted a message saying that a sub-inspector of Kanpur Crime Branch could get the chief minister murdered, was arrested from Allahabad on Saturday. According to the complaint made by SI Mohammad Arif , on June 12, he received a call from an unknown number three times. The caller introduced himself as an SI posted in Lucknow. content: У наступному саміті миру може взяти участь Росія, до того часу Україна має перебувати на найсильніших позиціях. Про це заявив міністр закордонних справ України Дмитро Кулеба. "Ідея в тому, щоб наступний саміт став завершенням війни. І звісно, нам треба за столом переговорів й інша сторона. Це очевидно, що для завершення війни треба обидві сторони. title: «رحيل 8 لاعبين».. مفاجآت بالجملة في ملف الراحلين عن الزمالك
content: ملف الراحلين عن الزمالك يشغل العديد من عشاق القلعة البيضاء، من أجل معرفة اللاعبين الذين سيرحلون عن أبيض ميت عقبة هذا الصيف. وستشهد قائمة الزمالك في الموسم الجديد رحيل عدد كبير من اللاعبين، إلى جانب خروج البعض الآخر على سبيل الإعارة. واستقر الجهاز الفني للفريق الأول لكرة القدم بنادي الزمالك على رحيل الخماسي، ياسر حمد وإبراهيما نداي وسامسون أكينيولا ومحمود علاء ومحمد أشرف روقا، بسبب عدم الحاجة الفنية. هذا وستتم إعارة الثلاثي، موتيابا ومهاب ياسر ومحمد عاطف. ويستعد الزمالك لخوض مباراة...

title: Russian Forces Kill ISIS-Linked Hostage Takers at Detention Center
creator: Reuters
content: MOSCOW—Russian special forces freed two prison guards and shot dead six inmates linked to the ISIS terrorist group who had taken them hostage at a detention centre in the southern city of Rostov on Sunday, Russian media said. State media said that some of the men had been convicted of terrorism offenses and were accused of affiliation with ISIS, which claimed responsibility for a deadly attack on a Moscow concert hall in March. title: Mi abuela, la pintora Rosario de Velasco
content: A partir del 18 de junio, mi abuela, Rosario de Velasco, volverá a ser una pintora famosa tras décadas en el olvido . title: Leh : जोजिला में पहाड़ से गिरे पत्थर की चपेट में आने से कार सवार दो यात्रियों की मौत, तीन घायल
creator: अमर उजाला नेटवर्क, गांदरबल/लेह
content: एक अधिकारी ने बताया कि रविवार को जोजिला के पास पानी माता इलाके में एक ऑल्टो कार पहाड़ी से गिरे बड़े पत्थर की चपेट में आ गई। हादसे में महिला और एक बच्चे की मौके पर ही मौत हो, जबकि तीन यात्री गंभीर रूप से घायल हो गए। घायलों को प्राथमिक स्वास्थ्य केंद्र सोनमर्ग में ले जाया गया, जहां से उन्हें श्रीनगर रेफर कर दिया गया। गांदरबल पुलिस मामले की जांच कर रही है।

title: «Раньше республика была недолюблена инвесторами»
content: В январе в Башкирии прогремели протесты, после того как на четыре года был осужден один из лидеров националистического движения «Башкорт» (признано экстремистским) – Фаиль Алсынов. Силовые структуры тогда жестко разогнали протестующих. Глава региона Радий Хабиров, комментируя эти события в начале года, говорил, что «где-то в этом есть и наша вина». Сейчас он заявляет о том, что «30-летние попытки шантажа властей республики националистическими структурами закончились». Хабиров, которому...

title: WKYC’s weather advisory blocks view of Bryson DeChambeau’s putt to win U.S. Open
creator: Mark Podolski
content: Golf fans in Northeast Ohio were not happy with NBC affiliate WKYC in the closing moments of the U.S. Open on June 16. Their frustrations were justified. For days, the weather forecast has called for temperatures near 100 degrees for the upcoming week. So while Bryson DeChambeau was approaching a putt to win his second U.S. Open title, WKYC — during its local broadcast of the prestigious golf tournament — began scrolling a heat advisory for the upcoming week, thus completely blocking the view...

content: Guwahati: Amid the torrential downpour in Meghalaya , Assam’s western districts, which share a border with Bhutan and Bangladesh, are now witnessing increased intensity of rain . title: Newsom Vetoes Zero Emission Vehicle Conversion Bill Due to Budget Shortfall
creator: Travis Gillmore
content: With California facing a budget deficit of at least $45 billion, Gov. Gavin Newsom vetoed on June 14 a bill that would have provided rebates for consumers wh0 convert their traditional automobiles into zero emission vehicles. Eligible vehicles would have needed to have a range of at least 100 miles and be inspected by a licensee of the state’s Bureau of Automotive Repair. title: Propalästinensische Proteste: Bundesbildungsministerin will Staatssekretärin in Ruhestand versetzen
creator: ZEIT ONLINE: Deutschland - Sophia Boddenberg
content: Bundesbildungsministerin Bettina Stark-Watzinger will ihre Staatssekretärin Sabine Döring in den einstweiligen Ruhestand versetzen lassen. Darum habe sie Bundeskanzler Olaf Scholz (SPD) gebeten, teilte die FDP-Politikerin über ihr Ministerium mit. Hintergrund ist ein offener Brief von Hochschullehrern, die sich im Mai hinter pro-palästinensische Proteste an Universitäten gestellt hatten. title: Mobilisasi Jemaah di Muzdalifah Selesai 07.37 WAS
content: - Proses mobilisasi jemaah haji Indonesia dari Muzdalifah ke Mina selesai pukul 07.37 Waktu Arab Saudi (WAS). title: Hong Kong most expensive city to be posted to
creator: Vicky Shaw
content: Hong Kong has again topped the list of the world's most expensive cities in a global index that looks at the costs of taking a job overseas. The Mercers index includes 226 locations across the world and measures the comparative cost of more than 200 items including transport, food, clothing, household goods and entertainment. Hong Kong retained the top spot in this year's ranking, followed by Singapore. Swiss cities Zurich, Geneva and Basel round out the top five most expensive cities. London...

title: Ankita enters quarters, earns individual Olympic quota in archery

title: Manas flows above danger level; Brahmaputra, tributaries rising
creator: Mukut Das
content: Guwahati: Manas River in lower Assam ’s Bongaigaon district has been flowing above the danger level since Friday owing to the incessant rainfall in the state. The water level of Brahmaputra and its tributaries are flowing below danger level, but with a rising trend at various locations. According to the Central Water Commission’s daily bulletin, the Manas River in Bongaigaon district was flowing at a level of 48.52 m, which is 0.1 mm above the danger level and 0.71 m above normal. title: Columna de Consuelo Contreras: Debido proceso: un derecho humano en riesgo
content: El debido proceso es un derecho humano consagrado en diversas convenciones internacionales. Fue incluido en la Declaración Universal de Derechos Humanos de 1948, en el Pacto Internacional de Derechos Civiles y Políticos de 1966 y en la Convención Americana de Derechos Humanos de 1969. Es un concepto que se ha desarrollado desde la jurisprudencia nacional e internacional y desde la academia de manera extensa. ¿Por qué es tan importante el debido proceso? title: Drunk man held for rash driving near Sukhna
content: Chandigarh: The UT police have arrested a Panchkula resident for alleged rash driving under the influence of liquor near Sukhna lake. According to sources, the speeding car also damaged some police barricades placed near the lake. The accused has been identified as Mukul , a resident of Sector 10,Panchkula. In his complaint, a home guard volunteer claimed the incident occured very close to the Haryana Raj Bhavan.

title: AI 新創 Pika 想成為 AI 版的 TikTok
creator: 品玩
content: 6 月 5 日,AI 影片生成工具 Pika 宣布完成 8,000 萬美元 B 輪融資。領投方是創投機構 Spark Capital,參與本輪投資的還有 Greycroft 、光速創投(Lightspeed Venture Partners)、Neo、Makers Fund,以及著名演員 Jared Leto,大西洋唱片公司 CEO Craig Kallman 等。這輪融資讓 Pika 的估值超過 4.7億美元,儼然半隻獨角獸。 Pika成立於2023年4月,創辦人包括史丹佛大學AI Lab的博士研究生郭文景(Demi Guo)、孟辰霖(Chenlin Meng)和陳思禹(Karli Chen)。他們最早在開發者社群 Discord上發布了Pika的產品Demo,一時受到廣泛歡迎。2023年11月,Pika宣布首輪5,500萬美元融資,投資人陣容堪稱矽谷式的明星組合:OpenAI的創始成員Andrej Karpathy,Perplexity創始人Aravind Srinivas,HuggingFace創始人Clem Delangue都是Pika的投資人。...

title: McIlroy's two missed short putts cost him shot at U.S. Open
creator: DAVE SKRETTA Associated Press
content: PINEHURST, N.C. — Rory McIlroy put himself in position to end a decade-long drought in the majors, and answer a whole lot of questions about his ability to get it done, only to miss two short putts Sunday that left him peeling out of the parking lot in disappointment. McIlroy signed for a final-round 69 that left him 5 under for the championship, and had to watch on TV in the scoring room as Bryson DeChambeau finished behind him. The big-hitting DeChambeau did what McIlroy could not — got it...

content: Vasco e Cruzeiro fizeram um jogo sem graça neste domingo, em São Januário, pela nona rodada do Campeonato Brasileiro, e o placar não saiu do 0 a 0. title: Выяснилось, кого украинцы винят в провале «мирного саммита» в Швейцарии
creator: Ирина Зражевская
content: Украинцы не смогли поверить в слова киевских властей, заверяющих об успехе «мирного саммита» в Швейцарии. Народ страны винит в провале мероприятия главу офиса . «Я думаю, что многие люди на Украине сейчас весьма критично относятся к Владимиру Зелинскому и особенно к руководителю его администрации Андрею Ермаку, который на самом деле и является тем человеком, который стоит за идеей этого саммита», — заявил корреспондент France 24 Гулливер Крегг. title: Grupo danifica catraca ao invadir estação do metrô de Salvador neste domingo
creator: Redação
content: Por Redação Na manhã deste domingo (16), uma ação criminosa surpreendeu usuários e funcionários da Estação Bonocô do Metrô de Salvador. Um grupo estimado em cerca de 15 pessoas conseguiu burlar as catracas de acesso ao sistema metroviário. Durante a invasão, um dos equipamentos de controle de acesso acabou sendo danificado, conforme informado pela CCR Metrô Bahia, responsável pela administração do serviço. title: 'Lênh đênh' giữa lòng thủ đô
content: Theo con đường nhỏ sâu hút từ ngõ An Dương (Tây Hồ), chúng tôi tới xóm Phao, nơi nằm tách biệt với vẻ đẹp lộng lẫy phía bên ngoài của thủ đô. Ở đó có những "ngôi nhà" tạm bợ, được chắp vá từ vô vàn mảnh phế liệu, nằm lênh đênh neo đậu sát mép một đoạn lạch sông Hồng , thuộc P.Ngọc Thụy, Q.Long Biên, Hà Nội, là nơi tá túc của hơn 40 hộ gia đình. title: México ocupa el lugar 29 en el ranking FIFA femenil
content: La selección azteca se ubica lejos de los primeros lugares a nivel mundial El ranking FIFA femenil ha sido actualizado, y México se encuentra en el puesto número 29. En la cima de la clasificación se ubica España, Francia e Inglaterra, seguidas por Alemania, Estados Unidos, Suecia, Japón, Canadá, Brasil y Corea del Norte, que completan el top 10. title: Génova adquire Vitinha
creator: online@record.pt (Record)
content: Está decidido! O Génova prepara-se para acionar a cláusula de compra de Vitinha, proporcionando ao Marselha um encaixe de 15 milhões de euros. Cedido ao emblema italiano até ao final deste mês, o avançado português de 24 anos formado no Sp. Braga vê assim recompensado o trabalho realizado na segunda metade da época [chegou ao Génova a 31 de janeiro], período em que cumpriu nove jogos e marcou dois golos. O clube francês não quer, no entanto, perder Vitinha completamente de vista...

title: Contrató a jugadores profesionales de videojuegos de rol para hacerle la vida imposible a su hijo al jugar en línea
creator: David Arvizu
content: MÉXICO.- En el 2013 , un joven chino de 23 años llamado Xiao Feng se obsesionó demasiado con los videojuegos de rol . Esto incomodaba a su padre el cuál hizo algo insólito al respecto. Todos los días se sentaba en el sofá de la casa de sus padres y jugaba por horas. title: ¿Cuántos tipos de uvas pasas hay y cuáles son mejores? Este nutriente es excelente para preservar la vista y controlar el peso
creator: Periodista Ocho
content: Las uvas pasas, ya sean blancas o negras , presentan ligeras diferencias en su composición, pero ambas destacan por su significativo aporte en hidratos de carbono que las convierte en una excelente fuente de energía. De acuerdo con la Fundación Española de Nutrición , las uvas también son ricas en potasio, vitamina B6 y vitamina C, componentes que contribuyen al balance nutricional de la dieta. También son una valiosa fuente de fitonutrientes y flavonoides, compuestos conocidos por sus...

title: Tough final time trial sees Egan Bernal lose podium spot at Tour de Suisse
creator: kirsten.frattini@futurenet.com
Kirsten Frattini
content: A challenging uphill final time trial saw Egan Bernal slip from third to fourth in the overall standings at the Tour de Suisse but the Colombian is hopeful that he has done enough to earn a spot on Ineos-Grenadiers' team for a GC tilt at the Tour de France, which starts on June 29 in Firenze. "It was hard. I hoped to keep the podium in this race, but this is cycling. I had a bad day on the bike," Bernal said in a post-race interview in Villars-sur-Ollon. title: Schools told to focus on dengue awareness
content: Dharwad: As suspected dengue cases and fever cases continue to spike in the district, particularly in rural areas and semi-urban pockets, the health department has taken up dengue prevention measures and awareness programmes on a war footing. While the paediatricians have raised concern over an increase in fever cases among children, the officials have decided to rope in schools and colleges in organising awareness programmes. title: Santuário desaba após deslizamento de terra no RS
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (Estadão Conteúdo)
content: Um santuário desabou na tarde deste domingo, 16, após deslizamento de terra em Dom Pedro de Alcântara, no litoral norte do Rio Grande do Sul. O acidente teria ocorrido minutos antes da celebração de uma missa. Não há relatos de feridos, mas, por precaução, o espaço foi isolado logo após o acidente, segundo informações preliminares. Em postagem nas redes sociais, o Santuário da Gruta Nossa Senhora de Lourdes informou que o desabamento ocorreu por volta das 16h. Pela publicação,...

title: 셀트리온, 키트루다 바이오시밀러 美 3상 임상시험계획서 제출

title: JDA sanctions ₹6.3cr to make road 100-feet wide as per HC order
content: Jaipur: Jaipur Development Authority ( JDA ) has sanctioned Rs 6.3 crore to strengthen and widen the stretch of road between Vande Mataram Marg and Heera Path in city. The decision, taken at a meeting of the civic body’s project works committee, follows an order from the High Court to widen the stretch of the road. JDA’s enforcement wing is preparing a procedure to remove the 215 encroachers found on this 3-km stretch. An eviction drive will start on June 18, said officials. “As per the master...

title: Bryson DeChambeau wins another U.S. Open with a clutch finish: ‘That’s Payne right there, baby’
content: By Doug Ferguson, The Associated Press PINEHURST, N.C. — Bryson DeChambeau won the U.S. Open on Sunday for the second time with the best shot of his life for another memorable finish on the 18th hole at Pinehurst No. 2 — and another heavy dose of heartache for Rory McIlroy. title: 부산middot;울산 대체로 맑고 더워...최고 체감 온도 31도 안팎
content: 부산, 울산은 대체로 맑은 가운데 무더위가 이어지겠다. 부산지방기상청에 따르면 17일은 고기압 영향권에 들면서 한낮에는 기온이 33도까지 오르겠다. 이날 아침 최저기온은 부산 25도, 울산 23도, 경남 19~24도 낮 최고기온은 부산 28도, 울산 28도, 경남 28~32도가 되겠다. 바다의 물결은 남해동부 앞바다에서 0.5~1.5m 남해동부 먼바다에서 0.5~2.0m로 일겠고 해안을 중심으로 바람이 강하게 불겠다. 내일(18일)과 모레(19일)는 맑은 날씨를 보이겠다....

title: If heat persists, govt may extend summer vacation
creator: Minati Singha
content: Bhubaneswar: Newly appointed school and mass education minister Nityananda Gond on Sunday said if weather condition does not improve, the state govt may think of extending the summer vacation . Several parts of Odisha continue to reel under severe heatwave, with hot and humid weather conditions making life difficult for people. Teachers under the Odisha State Secondary Teachers’ Association (OSSTA) have already urged the govt to extend summer holidays for a few more days till monsoon becomes...

title: Rory McIlroy criminally went back on his own word and it cost him US Open
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Joshua Lees)
content: Rory McIlroy opted to not follow his own advice when stood on the tee of the 72nd hole at this week's U.S. Open, going on to agonisingly lose the title by just one shot to Bryson DeChambeau. title: Rory McIlroy's two missed short putts cost him a shot at winning the U.S. Open
content: PINEHURST, N.C. — Rory McIlroy put himself in position to end a decade-long drought in the majors, and answer a whole lot of questions about his ability to get it done, only to miss two short putts Sunday that left him peeling out of the parking lot in disappointment. McIlroy signed for a final-round 69 that left him 5 under for the championship, and had to watch on TV in the scoring room as Bryson DeChambeau finished behind him. title: Indian Accused In Murder Plot Extradited To US From Czech Republic: Report
content: Federal prosecutors allege that Nikhil Gupta hired a hitman to kill Gurpatwant Singh Pannun. Indian national Nikhil Gupta, who is accused of being involved in murder-for-hire plot against a Sikh separatist, has been extradited from Czech Republic, media reports said Sunday. title: 松山英樹は6位 全米OP
content: 【6月17日 AFP】男子ゴルフの今季メジャー第3戦、全米オープン選手権( 2024 US Open Championship )は16日、米ノースカロライナ州パインハースト( Pinehurst )のパインハーストリゾート&CC( Pinehurst Resort & Country Club 、パー70)で最終日が行われ、松山英樹( Hideki Matsuyama )はイーブンパーでホールアウトし、通算2アンダーの6位に入った。 1オーバー「71」でラウンドしたブライソン・デシャンボー( Bryson DeChambeau 、米国)が、通算6アンダーで自身2度目となる大会制覇を飾った。(c)AFP

title: Tlaxcoapan: comerciantes van contra tiendas chinas

title: Two bikers killed, four injured on Outer Ring Road
content: Chennai: Two bike riders were killed and four other youngsters were seriously injured in a 'mysterious' accident that took place on the Outer Ring Road (ORR) on Saturday evening. With one of the cameras in the area not working, police are struggling to determine the exact cause of the accident. Speculation is rife about the nature of the accident. title: Daniel Llanos se quedó con el triunfo en el Rally de Picún Leufú
creator: Matías Vega
content: Haciendo gala de una gran regularidad, el barilochense Daniel Llanos se quedó con la victoria en la General y en la A6 del Rally de Picún Leufú , correspondiente a la cuarta fecha del certamen que organiza APPRyN Sur. Al mando de su VW Polo, Llanos, navegado por Federico Centani, recorrió los 90,20 km de velocidad en 54m45s9 y aventajó en la General al Ford Fiesta Kinetic de la RC5 de Adrián Altamirano, por 8s6. title: Rory McIlroy's two missed short putts cost him a shot at winning the U.S. Open
creator: DAVE SKRETTA, Associated Press
content: PINEHURST, N.C. (AP) — Rory McIlroy put himself in position to end a decade-long drought in the majors, and answer a whole lot of questions about his ability to get it done, only to miss two short putts Sunday that left him peeling out of the parking lot in disappointment. McIlroy signed for a final-round 69 that left him 5 under for the championship, and had to watch on TV in the scoring room as Bryson DeChambeau finished behind him. title: Rory McIlroy's two missed short putts cost him a shot at winning the U.S. Open
creator: By DAVE SKRETTA - AP Sports Writer

title: Rory McIlroy's two missed short putts cost him a shot at winning the U.S. Open
content: McIlroy signed for a final-round 69 that left him 5 under for the championship, and had to watch on TV in the scoring room as Bryson DeChambeau finished behind him. The big-hitting DeChambeau did what McIlroy could not — got it done around the green — when he got up-and-down for par from 55 yards in a bunker short of the 18th green for a 71 and a one-shot victory . “Rory was going on a heater, and he slipped up a couple on the way coming in, and I just kept staying the course,” DeChambeau said....

title: Burglars’ theft attempt at bungalow foiled
content: Vadodara: A gang of burglars broke into a bungalow in Pipariya village in Waghodia late on Saturday night. But before they could steal anything, one of the family members woke up and raised an alarm following which the gang escaped. Images of the burglars were captured on the CCTVs installed in the bungalow. Ajay Sinha, the bungalow owner, said that his daughter woke up hearing the noises and screamed for help. title: Lilia Vu returns from injury, beats Lexi Thompson, Grace Park in Meijer LPGA playoff
content: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. — Lilia Vu won the Meijer LPGA Classic in a playoff Sunday in her return from a back injury, spoiling Lexi Thompson’s bid for her first victory in five years. Playing for the first time since the Ford Championship in late March in Arizona, Vu beat Thompson and third-round leader Grace Kim with a 5-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole — the par-5 fourth at tree-lined Blythefield Country Club. A former No. 1 player and double major winner last year, Vu won for the fifth...

content: La Paz, 16 de junio de 2024 (ABI). – Desde el año 2011 a la fecha, el Banco Central de Bolivia (BCB) emitió bonos por Bs 15.000 millones y pagó por concepto de intereses Bs 688 millones que confirman que es una entidad que cumple con sus compromisos, afirmó el gerente general de la Gestora, Jaime Durán. title: Muss der Arbeitgeber wissen, warum ich krankgeschrieben bin?
content: Gütersloh - Manch ein Arbeitgeber ist bei Krankschreibungen vielleicht neugieriger, als er sein sollte. Auch wenn Beschäftigte bisweilen schon von sich aus mitteilen, warum sie krank sind, besteht dazu eigentlich gar keine Pflicht. Wenn Sie als Arbeitnehmer erkranken und nicht arbeiten können, müssen Sie laut Johannes Schipp, Fachanwalt für Arbeitsrecht, lediglich eine ärztliche Arbeitsunfähigkeitsbescheinigung einholen. Der Arbeitgeber kann diese Bescheinigung entweder direkt von Ihnen...

'Remote control' of yesteryears
creator: The New Paper
content: Television sets have not always been flat screens. They used to be bulky boxes that came with knobs or dials that had to be turned for what few TV channels there were. In the early years of independence, not every Singapore household could afford TV sets, so it was not uncommon to see neighbours crowding outside a home that had a TV for some communal viewing. There was no remote control for the TV sets – the youngest at home would automatically be on "switch channels' duty.

title: México detecta a casi 1,4 millones de migrantes irregulares

content: Las autoridades mexicanas detectaron a casi 1,4 millones de “personas en situación migratoria irregular” entre enero y mayo de 2024, quienes provienen de 77 países de los cinco continentes. title: Столтенберг: НАТО обсуждает приведение ядерного оружия в боеготовность
content: "Я не буду вдаваться в подробности о том, сколько ядерных боеголовок должно быть в боеготовности, но нам нужно проконсультироваться по этим вопросам. title: Man kills 2-year-old daughter for crying incessantly
content: Ahmedabad: Unable to calm down his two-year-old daughter who was unwell and had been crying inconsolably, a 25-year-old ragpicker strangled her and dumped her body near the pillar of a bridge over Harnav River at Khedbrahma in Sabarkantha on Wednesday night. The accused, Mukesh Valmiki, was caught by walkers near the bridge and handed over to the cops. They rushed the child to Khedbrahma Civil Hospital where a doctor declared her brought dead. title: Hundreds of students walk out at Stanford University graduation
creator: Rebecca Ellis Los Angeles Times
content: Hundreds of Stanford University students walked out of their graduation ceremony Sunday in a show of support for Palestinians, capping a tumultuous year on campus rocked by protests related to the Israel-Hamas war. Videos circulating on social media show a trickle of students, many waving kaffiyehs and Palestinian flags, get up from their chairs as Stanford President Richard Saller delivers his speech to the graduating class. title: Mann soll schwangere Freundin getötet haben: Urteil erwartet
content: Köln - Im Prozess um den Mord an einer schwangeren Frau aus Leverkusen wird am Montag (14.00 Uhr) das Urteil erwartet. Angeklagt in dem Prozess vor dem Kölner Landgericht ist der 34 Jahre alte ehemalige Lebensgefährte der Frau, der auch Vater des ungeborenen Kindes gewesen sein soll. Die Anklage lautet auf heimtückischen Mord aus niedrigen Beweggründen in Tateinheit mit verbotenem Schwangerschaftsabbruch. creator: AP via Scripps News
content: Israel's military announced on Sunday that it would pause fighting during daytime hours along a route in southern Gaza to free up a backlog of humanitarian aid deliveries for desperate Palestinians enduring a humanitarian crisis sparked by the war, now in its ninth month. title: Індія пояснила, чому не підтримала спільне комюніке Глобального саміту миру
content: 78 країн підписали спільне комюніке Саміту миру Індія не підтримала спільне комюніке Саміту миру, адже вважає, що тільки ті варіанти, які прийнятні для обох сторін, можуть привести до міцного миру. Про це повідомляє Міністерство закордонних справ країни. У МЗС зауважили, що продовжуватимуть співпрацювати з обома сторонами конфлікту, щоб сприяти серйозним зусиллям для досягнення міцного миру в Україні. «Наша участь у цьому саміті та постійна взаємодія з усіма зацікавленими сторонами...

title: 網紅赴中拍片被統戰?! 人渣文本狠狠打槍
content: 網紅波特王近期爆料中共政府欲邀請台灣網紅赴中國旅遊並進行宣傳,引起關注與討論。(翻攝自臉書) 林南谷/核稿編輯 〔娛樂頻道/綜合報導〕知名Youtuber「波特王」日前爆料,7月下旬將有10組台灣網紅受邀中國旅遊拍片,踢爆中共疑似對台進行文化統戰,筆名「人渣文本」作家周偉航則有不同見解。 相關新聞:何以奇掀中共文化統戰!曝外宣策略操作:溫水煮青蛙 請繼續往下閱讀... 人渣文本認為現在被影射個案,其相關證據有些薄弱,他說:「每個網紅去中國拍片的動力因可能落差甚大,有些可能是真的收到中國政府業配,有些可能他個人就是喜歡中國,還有一些則是沒有價值判斷力,不瞭解其中的政治水深。」 相關新聞:被酸「雙標」為錢拍反中題材 波特王:要是能賺大錢你就來拍 平心而論,人渣文本表示目前沒有可靠證據證明網紅有收中國好處之前,不應該直接貼標籤說這人為匪宣傳,但其作品本身的道德與政治意義,還是可以受到外界評價,或甚至「前往中國拍片」也可以討論的。 相關新聞:中國驚爆收買台灣藝人組黨 大支不忍嗆爆了...

content: रात 2.20 बजे। संत प्रेमानंद महाराज अपने आश्रम जा रहे हैं। चाराें तरफ से उनके शिष्य घेरे हैं। भक्त उनकी एक झलक पाने के लिए दोनों तरफ राधा रानी-श्रीकृष्ण का उद्घोष कर रहे हैं। वह आशीर्वाद देते हुए निकल जाते हैं। यह दृश्य है वृंदावन के रमण रेती की गली का। कथावाचक प्रदीप मिश्रा के राधा रानी पर दिए बयान पर गुस्सा जताने वाले संत प्रेमानंद महाराज इस समय सुर्खियों में हैं। प्रेमानंद महाराज की जितनी तेजी से ख्याति बढ़ रही है, उतनी तेजी से वृंदावन में उनके आश्रम के आसपास के लोगों की आजीविका भी बढ़ने लगी...

content: Nagpur: Enthusiastic and responsible citizens joined hands with the Nagpur Municipal Corporation (NMC) to clean Ambazari lake by removing the fast-growing water hyacinth on Sunday morning. title: Portugal continua a ser dos países onde menos se paga por notícias online

title: 以巴衝突|以軍每日局部停火11小時送物資 內塔尼亞胡稱不可接受
link: https://www.stheadline.com/realtime-world/3354684/以巴衝突以軍每日局部停火11小時送物資-內塔尼亞胡稱不可接受
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 以色列軍方周日宣布,每天將在加沙走廊南部部分地區實行軍事活動戰術性暫停11小時,以方便救援組織運送救援物資。以色列總理內塔尼亞胡對此作出批評,認為計劃是不可接受的。 以色列軍方宣布,每天上午8時至晚上7時,在凱雷姆沙洛姆(Kerem Shalom)口岸到薩拉赫丁(Salah al-Din)公路及向北道路,實行出於人道目的的戰術性軍事活動暫停,直至另行通知。 一名以色列官員表示:「當總理早上聽到有關人道主義援助暫停 11 小時的報道時,他向軍事秘書明確表示,這對他來說是不可接受的。」軍方期後澄清,拉法將繼續正常行動。拉法是現時在加沙南部行動的主要焦點,周六有八名士兵在拉法被殺。 路透社報道指,內塔尼亞胡的反應突顯了加沙援助問題上的政治緊張局勢,國際組織警告加薩人道危機日益嚴重。內塔尼亞胡執政聯盟中民族主義 相關新聞: 以巴衝突|以軍加沙南部遭伏擊 8名士兵喪生 以巴衝突—以軍救4名人質殺了274人傷了698人 大部分是平民 以巴衝突—以軍救出4人質 包括中以混血女諾亞Noa Argamani—有片 以巴衝突|哈馬斯稱以軍在努塞拉特營救行動中 殺害了部分人質 ---...

title: Muss der Arbeitgeber wissen, warum ich krankgeschrieben bin?
content: Manch ein Arbeitgeber ist bei Krankschreibungen vielleicht neugieriger, als er sein sollte. Auch wenn Beschäftigte bisweilen schon von sich aus mitteilen, warum sie krank sind, besteht dazu eigentlich gar keine Pflicht. Wenn Sie als Arbeitnehmer erkranken und nicht arbeiten können, müssen Sie laut Johannes Schipp, Fachanwalt für Arbeitsrecht, lediglich eine ärztliche Arbeitsunfähigkeitsbescheinigung einholen. Der Arbeitgeber kann diese Bescheinigung entweder direkt von Ihnen erhalten oder...

title: Tuvinyco, campió en +35 de l’Andorra Sènior Cup
creator: V. D.
content: Tuvinyco, equip de veterans de Navarra, va conquerir la catorzena edició de l’Andorra Sènior Cup en la categoria de més 35 anys. L’equip tenia jugadors com Mario Gibanel, Ander Murillo, Fede Bessone o Enric Pi. Els navarresos van vèncer per 2 a 1 el Bemiser Team de Saragossa en què jugava Javi Paredes. Els Veterans Girona FC, vigents campions, van perdre en semifinals. En més 45 anys, va guanyar el Crevillente en superar a la final l’Alesves.

title: Un total de 500 ‘riders’ a la Maxiavalanche
creator: V. D.
content: La Maxiavalanche, la primera competició de BTT de la temporada al Bike Park de Pal Arinsal, va reunir 500 riders amb més de 1.500 persones entre competidors i aficionats a la BTT. El programa de competició es va iniciar divendres i va seguir dissabte per finalitzar ahir en un circuit que va tenir un desnivell de 900 metres. Ahir es van disputar les categories Maxi Elite, e-Maxi (per a bicicletes elèctriques), Maxi Challengers, Dones, Masters 50 i 60 i Maxi Amateurs.

content: layak dinobatkan sebagai pemain terbaik alias man of the match vs . Kedua tim bertemu dalam duel matchday 1 Grup C , Minggu 16 Juni 2024 malam WIB. Pertandingan pembuka Grup C kali ini dimainkan di Stuttgart Arena. Laga memang diprediksi ketat karena kedua tim berada di level yang sama, tidak ada yang benar-benar unggul. Laga pun berakhir imbang 1-1. Meski begitu, Denmark dianggap punya pemain-pemain yang lebih berkualitas, dan benar demikianlah yang terjadi di lapangan. Denmark sangat dominan...

title: [굿모닝 증시]"코스피, 환율 동향·중국 경제지표에 주목"
content: 17일 한국 증시는 원·달러 환율 동향에 주시하며 움직일 것으로 예상된다. 금리 인하에 대한 불확실성과 유럽의 정치적 혼란 등이 환율 상방을 높이는 요인이기 때문이다. 이런 가운데 이날 발표하는 중국의 5월 경제지표도 시장에 영향을 미칠 요인으로 꼽힌다. 지난 14일(현지시간) 뉴욕증권거래소(NYSE)에서 블루칩 중심의 다우존스30산업평균지수는 전 거래일보다 57.94포인트(0.15%) 내린 3만8589.16에 장을 마감했다. S&P 500지수는...

title: From Uber rides to global insights: How media bias shapes perceptions of identities
content: I once got a “0” star review on Uber. While taking a short ride in Manhattan, the driver asked me where I was from, and without thinking too much, I answered, “Israel.” We conversed for a few moments about the and then the ride ended. Without thinking too much about it, I checked my phone later that day to order another ride and found out I had my first “0” star review on the app. I quickly realized the cause. The Uber incident was a wake-up call. Returning from another visit to the US, I felt...

title: Woman kills her 2 kids, hangs self
content: Lucknow: A woman allegedly killed her two children and committed suicide in Lalganj area of Rae Bareli on Sunday. “The woman, Soni Yadav (35), allegedly strangled her children Rounak (5) and Rimjhim (3) at her home. No one else was present in the house," said SP Rae Bareli Abhishek Agarwal. The motive behind the incident is not clear, he said. However, locals claimed the woman was under depression . Ratibhan Yadav, a farmer, had married Soni eight years ago after his first marriage did not...

title: Yoga Day official event at SMS Stadium on June 21
content: Jaipur: The district administration will celebrate International Yoga Day with an event at the SMS Stadium on June 21. Officials said, this event will be the state govt’s official event. “Yoga sessions will also be conducted at district, block and panchayat committee headquarters from 7am to 8am on June 21,” said a district official. The Ayurveda Department under the district administration will coordinate event. “In a meeting held on Saturday we made all preparations for the event. Government...

title: Faking links with bigwigs to cheat man lands crook in trouble
content: Ahmedabad: A deputy superintendent of police with CID (crime), Ahmedabad zone, on Saturday filed a complaint against a Memnagar resident for allegedly trying to cheat a Satellite resident of Rs 3 crore to settle legal cases while claiming that had connections in the state’s power corridors and with top policemen. R B Desai, an in-charge deputy SP with CID, said in his FIR with CID (crime) police of Ahmedabad zone that Soma Patel, a resident of Kameshwar-Vihar Bungalows near Shivranjani...

title: В Ростове-на-Дону упаковочная пленка спровоцировала вспышку на подстанции
creator: Бутенко Наталья Александровна
content: На западе Ростова-на-Дону на подстанции произошла вспышка из-за упаковочной пленки, которую ветром занесло на территорию энергетического объекта. Об этом в воскресенье, 16 июня, сообщила пресс-служба компании «Россети Юг». «В результате произошло кратковременное перекрытие изоляторов, которое стало причиной яркой вспышки. Нарушения электроснабжения по сети «Ростовэнерго» нет», — говорится в сообщении в Telegram-канале компании. Там уточнили, что в данный момент специалисты проводят осмотр...

title: CII bats for IT relief in lower slab
creator: Daily Excelsior
content: NEW DELHI, June 16: Income tax relief for the people in the lowest slab may need to be considered in the upcoming full Budget for 2024-25 considering the high levels of inflation, according to newly-elected CII president Sanjiv Puri. In an interview with PTI, he also suggested creation of an institutional platform for consensus building between the Centre and states to successfully carry out all reforms, including those related to land, labour, power and agriculture. The industry body also said...

title: En fotos: la monumental celebración del primer título del Bucaramanga en el FPC
content: Miles de aficionados dieron este domingo en Bucaramanga , capital del departamento colombiano de Santander, una apoteósica bienvenida al equipo de fútbol la ciudad que el sábado se coronó en Bogotá campeón de la liga profesional por primera vez en 75 años . En un emocionante partido de vuelta que se alargó hasta los penaltis, Atlético Bucaramanga le ganó 6-5 a Santa Fe en la tanda de tiros desde los doce pasos, luego del empate global 3-3 . Para los seguidores del 'leopardo', vestidos...

title: Beniwal approves ₹5 crore from MLA-LAD fund before resigning
content: Jaipur: Newly elected MP from Nagaur Hanuman Beniwal has set an example for other legislators by approving a sum of Rs 5 crore from MLA-LAD fund for development works in the Khinvsar assembly constituency before resigning from his MLA post. Beniwal held a special public hearing for the people of Khinvsar and conducted village-wise meetings with them before issuing the approvals for development works. The approved works mainly include community buildings, Ambedkar buildings, CC blocks,...

title: Pilibhit News: जयपुर रूट पर धड़ल्ले से हो रही डग्गामारी
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, पीलीभीत
content: पीलीभीत। अधिकारियों की अनदेखी के चलते जिले की परिवहन सेवाएं दम तोड़ती नजर आ रही है। रोजाना हजारों की संख्या में जिले के लोगों का जयपुर आना-जाना रहता है। इसके बावजूद इस रूट पर एक भी रोडवेज बस नहीं है। इस रूट पर धड़ल्ले से डग्गामारी हो रही है। जिले से बड़ी संख्या में श्रमिक व अन्य लोग राजस्थान के जयपुर, अलवर जैसी जगहों पर जाते हैं। लंबे समय से इस रूट पर रोडवेज बस सेवा शुरू करने की मांग की जा रही मगर अधिकारी ध्यान नहीं दे रहे। सोमवार को ईद है। ऐसे में राजस्थान में विभिन्न जगहों पर कार्य कर रहे...

title: Exjugador de Rayados sufre atentado junto a su familia
creator: Yunior Carteño
content: Deportes comentarios Exjugador de Rayados sufre atentado junto a su familia El futbolista fue interceptado por unos sujetos, quienes dispararon contra su auto Edwin Cardona sufrió un atentado. Foto: Mexport (JORGE MARTINEZ) Por Yunior Carteño 16 de junio 2024 a las 17:34 hrs. La inseguridad que se vive alrededor del mundo no está exenta para los futbolistas profesionales , como fue el caso reciente de Edwin Cardona , exjugador de Rayados , quien sufrió un atentado junto a su familia. title: Packers could start these two rookies on defense
creator: Ely Allen, Pro Football Rumors
content: The Packers used their first-round pick this year on an offensive tackle and Arizona’s Jordan Morgan is expected to earn a starting role at left tackle over the incumbent Rasheed Walker, but the team’s next two draft picks could be on their way to starting roles , as well, according to ESPN’s Rob Demovsky. Green Bay had two second-round picks in this year’s draft and they used both of them on SEC defenders. At 45th overall, the Packers took Texas A&M linebacker Edgerrin Cooper, then 13 picks...

title: Tony Finau’s strong Sunday at the U.S. Open gives him his best major finish since 2019, as Zac Blair has a career week at Pinehurst
content: It’s been three years since Tony Finau had back-to-back, top-20 major championship finishes. Now in the past month, Finau tied for 18th place at the PGA Championship and charged up the leaderboard on Sunday to tie for third at the U.S. Open. He shot 4-under-par 67 on the final day — tied for the best round on the course — and did nearly all of it with his short game and approach. He had three birdies on the back nine and an eagle on the fifth hole. He ended just two shots behind eventual winner...

title: Columna de Ricardo Abuauad: Causas conocidas, soluciones por conocer
content: Chile es un país de conversaciones estacionales: incendios en verano, inundaciones en invierno, sin que nada mejore radicalmente año tras año. Pero esto hay que decirlo: nuestras ciudades resisten mal las lluvias intensas y esto tiene una causa, planificación e inversión escasas e inadecuadas. Porque cuando las cosas se hicieron bien, se nota. La notable y previsora red de alcantarillado y aguas lluvias del Santiago del Centenario, desarrollada por Batignolles Fould, resiste sin problemas...

title: Muss der Arbeitgeber wissen, warum ich krankgeschrieben bin?
content: Muss der Arbeitgeber wissen, warum ich krankgeschrieben bin? Viele Arbeitgeber akzeptieren Krankmeldungen ohne Nachfragen. Andere zweifeln sie an oder erkundigen sich nach dem Grund. Doch was muss ich meinem Chef über meinen Gesundheitszustand erzählen? Gütersloh - Manch ein Arbeitgeber ist bei Krankschreibungen vielleicht neugieriger, als er sein sollte. Auch wenn Beschäftigte bisweilen schon von sich aus mitteilen, warum sie krank sind, besteht dazu eigentlich gar keine Pflicht. Wenn Sie...

title: Officer removed from duty after ramming runaway cow, says UK police
content: LONDON, June 17 — An officer who tried to intercept a fleeing cow by hitting it with a vehicle in England has been removed from duty, police said in a statement yesterday. The incident occurred on Friday evening after police were called to a sighting of a cow in a residential area of the small town of Staines-upon-Thames in southern England. Surrey Police on Sunday said that the officer driving the car had been “removed from frontline duties pending the outcome of these investigations”. Deputy...

title: Nuclear arms more prominent amid geopolitical tensions: researchers
creator: Agence France-Presse
content: The role of atomic weapons has become more prominent and nuclear states are modernising arsenals as geopolitical relations deteriorate, researchers said on Monday, urging world leaders to “step back and reflect”. Diplomatic efforts to control nuclear arms also suffered major setbacks amid strained international relations over the conflicts in Ukraine and Gaza, the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI) said in its annual yearbook. “We have not seen nuclear weapons playing such...

title: Jammu News: बाबा सिद्ध गोरिया मठ पर मेला, श्रद्धालुओं ने माथा टेककर लिया आशीर्वाद
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, जम्मू
content: हजारों श्रद्धालुओं ने बाबा के मठ पर लगाई हाजिरी, जिला प्रशासन ने किए गए थे पुख्ता इंतजाम संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी रामगढ़। सांबा जिले की रामगढ़ तहसील के गांव सिद्ध स्वांखा में रविवार से एक सप्ताह तक चलने वाला बाबा सिद्ध गोरिया नाथ जी का मेला शुरू हो गया। मेले के मद्देनजर बाहरी राज्यों से आने वाले श्रद्धालुओं के लिए जिला प्रशासन और मंदिर संस्था ने कड़े प्रबंध किए हैं। मेले में हरियाणा, पंजाब, हिमाचल प्रदेश, दिल्ली, उत्तर प्रदेश, बिहार, महाराष्ट्र, मध्य प्रदेश और गुजरात के श्रद्धालु पहुंचे। दोपहर तक...

title: Funcionaria del Insai propició invasión violenta en Cagua
creator: Redacción Periodiquito
content: Fernan Hernández Productores del campo denunciaron que siempre son víctimas de este tipo de atropellos e esta zona Un productor del campo, fue víctima de una agresión violenta con amenaza de invasión, amparada presuntamente por una funcionaria que responde al nombre de Lourdes Herrera, quien se identificó con un carnet del Instituto Nacional de Salud Agrícola Integral (INSAI). El hecho causó conmoción en el asentamiento campesino “Hugo Chávez”, del sector Ciudad Jardín, de Cagua,...

title: Encuentran muerto a un turista estadounidense en una pequeña isla griega; hay otros tres viajeros desaparecidos
creator: Belén Liotti
content: (AP) -- Un turista estadounidense desaparecido fue encontrado muerto en una playa de una pequeña isla griega al oeste de Corfú, según informaron medios locales. El cuerpo del hombre fue encontrado por otro turista este domingo en una playa rocosa y bastante remota en la isla de Mathraki. Su anfitrión, un amigo grecoestadounidense, había denunciado su desaparición este jueves. El turista fue visto por última vez este martes en un café acompañado de dos turistas que abandonaron la isla....

title: Illegal colonies in eco-zones razed
content: Jaipur: JDA ’s enforcement wing on Sunday razed three under-construction illegal colonies in the ecological zone of the city. One of the colonies was coming up on four bighas of land at Jaisinghpura Khora. The two other townships were coming up on three acres of land each ay Bagarna village off Agra Road. tnn

title: KB證 "아이티엠반도체, 온디바이스AI 진짜 수혜주... 목표가 29%↑"
creator: 최이레
content: [그래픽=아이티엠반도체] KB증권이 17일 아이티엠반도체에 대해 온디바이스AI(내장형 AI)의 진짜 수혜주라고 평가하며 목표주가를 29% 올렸다. 투자의견은 '매수'를 유지했다. KB증권에 따르면 아이티엠반도체의 올해 2분기 매출액은 전년 동기 대비 27% 증가한 1456억원, 영업손실은 24억원으로 적자가 지속될 것으로 추정된다. 2분기 실적과 관련해 이창민 KB증권 연구원은 "북미 고객사 스마트폰 신제품향 매출 반영이 시작되는 가운데 국내 고객사...

title: Panchkula News: बुखार पीड़ितों के लिए जल्द शुरू होगी स्पेशल ओपीडी
content: पंचकूला। सेक्टर-6 सिविल अस्पताल में बुखार के बढ़ते मामलों को देखकर स्पेशल ओपीडी अगले हफ्ते से शुरू की जाएगी। इसके लिए पंचकूला स्वास्थ्य विभाग की तरफ से प्लान तैयार किया गया है। बुखार के मरीजों की संख्या ओपीडी सहित इमरजेंसी में बढ़ी है। पंचकूला सिविल अस्पताल सेक्टर-6 में लगातार बुखार के छह सौ से अधिक मामले रोजाना आ रहे हैं। इसमें पंचकूला के अलावा इमरजेंसी में कालका, पिंजौर, मोरनी, रायपुररानी सहित पंजाब और चंडीगढ़ के लगते एरिया से भी मरीज आ रहे हैं। पंचकूला सिविल अस्पताल सेक्टर-6 के पीएमओ डॉ....

title: Tribal man assaulted for refusing to vacate own house
content: Ahmedabad: A 33-year-old man from Ranip on Saturday filed a complaint with the police alleging that two men have been abusing and threatening him, asking him to vacate his house as he belongs to a tribal community. Bharat Dodiyar, a resident of Dwarkadheesh Society in Ranip, said in his FIR with Ranip police that he and his parents have been living in the residential society for 28 years. Three years ago, his parents moved to their native village in Bhiloda taluka of Arvalli. Since then he has...

title: 78 countries at Swiss conference agree Ukraine’s territorial integrity must be basis of any peace
creator: The Associated Press
content: Article content OBBURGEN, Switzerland — Nearly 80 countries called Sunday for the “territorial integrity” of Ukraine to be the basis for any peace agreement to end Russia’s two-year war, though some key developing nations at a Swiss conference did not join in. The way forward for diplomacy remains unclear. The joint communiqué capped a two-day conference marked by the absence of Russia, which was not invited. Many attendees expressed hope that Russia might join in on a road map to peace in the...

title: حارس نيوكاسل يقترب من الدوري السعودي
content: هاي كورة – كشفت تقارير صحفية أن مارتن دوبرافكا حارس مرمى نيوكاسل يونايتد، يقترب من الانضمام إلى الدوري السعودي للمحترفين، خلال فترة الانتقالات الصيفية الحالية. وفقاً للتقارير فأن الحارس صاحب ال35 عاماً أيضاً على رادار بريندان رودجرز مدرب سيلتيك هذا الصيف. يجري مارتن دوبرافكا محادثات مع ممثلي الدوري السعودي للمحترفين حول الانتقال إلى السعودية.

title: गंगा दशहरा : पर्व स्नान के लिए उमड़े श्रद्धालु, आस्था की लगाई डुबकी
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, शाहजहाँपुर
content: मिर्जापुर। गंगा दशहरा पर ढाई घाट गंगा तट पर रविवार को श्रद्धालुओं का सैलाब उमड़ा। उन्होंने हर-हर गंगे के उद्घोष के साथ आस्था की डुबकी लगाई। गंगा मैया से परिवार की समृद्धि व खुशहाली की कामना की। ब्रह्म मुहूर्त से शुरू हुआ गंगा स्नान का सिलसिला देर शाम तक चलता रहा। महिलाओं व बच्चों ने मेले में सजी दुकानों से सौंदर्य प्रसाधन समेत घरेलू उपयोग का सामान खरीदा और चाट-पकौड़ी का लुत्फ उठाया। इस दौरान श्रद्धालुओं की सुरक्षा के लिए जनपद समेत फर्रुखाबाद का प्रशासन मुस्तैदी से मेला स्थल पर डटा रहा। पर्व...

title: Kickboxer with impaired leg wins gold in national tourney
creator: Tushar Tere
content: Vadodara: She is just 18. But Dinkal Gorkha, a city-based kickboxer , has already won her second gold medal in the point fight in Junior National Kickboxing tournament held recently in West Bengal. What makes her victory special is that Gorkha competes with her opponents with a partially damaged leg and still dominates the game. Gorkha has won a medal in almost every kickboxing tournament she participated in, in the last few years. But despite her achievements, she is still struggling to make...

title: 12 injured as bus rams into truck in Chandauli
content: Varanasi: At least 12 pilgrims from Jharkhand and West Bengal were injured when their bus rammed into a stationary truck on the national highway in Jhansi village of UP’s Chandauli district on Sunday morning. The pilgrims were heading to the Kedarnath shrine in Uttarakhand. Chandauli SP Anil Kumar said the injured pilgrims were admitted to the district hospital. title: Bryson DeChambeau wins U.S. Open after Rory McIlroy bogies on 3 of final 4 holes
content: Going into the final hole at the U.S. Open, Rory McIlroy was 496-for-496 putting inside three feet this season So odds were in his favor that a four-foot putt on the 16th hole would go in to help him secure a U.S. Open victory. But a bogie on that hole and two more on the final four holes — including a six-foot miss on the 18th — led to a heartbreaking defeat as Bryson DeChambeau claimed victory on Sunday afternoon at Pinehurst. Sunday marked DeChambeau’s second U.S. Open win. He narrowly beat...

title: 雙重傷害!男子遇詐帳戶存款遭提領一空,獨留「87」元
content: 男子誤信投資詐騙交付銀行金融卡及密碼。(示意圖,資料照) 〔記者佟振國/南投報導〕南投縣埔里鎮男子誤信投資詐騙,將銀行金融卡與密碼交付詐騙集團,帳戶內6、70萬元存款遭提領一空,獨留87元,數字諧音似乎是在嘲笑男子那麼容易受騙上當,警方也提醒男子的行為不僅痛失金錢,一旦帳戶成為詐騙集團犯罪工具,還會因此吃上官司,真是得不償失。 據了解,被害人去年才誤信社群軟體上可享高獲利的投資股票訊息,陸續透過面交方式將現金交給冒充投資理專的詐騙集團車手,結果被詐騙上千萬元。 沒想到男子沒有學到教訓,最近又誤信投資詐騙,這次不是交付現金,而是聽從詐騙集團指示交付金融卡與密碼,稱是獲利後的轉帳之用。 男子於是將帳戶內還有6、70萬元的金融卡寄出,不僅沒有等到獲利來臨,查詢帳戶後才發現自己的錢已被提領一空,氣得報警。 警方受理展開偵辦,發現男子的金融卡帳戶只留零頭87元,數字諧音似詐騙集團的極盡嘲笑與挑釁,對於男子二度遭詐騙也十分無言,強調民眾輕易交付金融卡及密碼等重要物品、資訊給他人,不僅痛失帳戶內的存款,一旦淪為人頭帳戶、犯罪工具,還會變成詐欺案幫助犯而吃上官司,得不償失。 不用抽 不用搶...

title: Искали в Таджикистане, нашли — в Петербурге: задержан нелегал-вербовщик боевиков
content: В Петербурге задержали находившегося в розыске гражданина Таджикистана. Как сообщает АН «Оперативное прикрытие», 37-летний мигрант был в бегах шесть лет. Его искали в Таджикистане, а нашли в Петербурге. Отмечается, что он проходит по делу о незаконном вовлечении и участии граждан Таджикистана в вооруженных подразделениях, конфликте или военных действиях на территории других государств. title: أبو الغيط يبارك للمغرب عيد الأضحى
content: توصل الملك محمد السادس ببرقية تهنئة من الأمين العام لجامعة الدول العربية، أحمد أبو الغيط، وذلك بمناسبة حلول عيد الأضحى المبارك. ومما جاء في برقية الأمين العام لجامعة الدول العربية: “يشرفني بمناسبة حلول عيد الأضحى المبارك أن أعبر لجلالتكم عن أصدق التهاني وأطيب التمنيات”. وأضاف أبو الغيط: “أتضرع لله العلي القدير أن يعيده على جلالتكم بالصحة والسعادة، وعلى الشعب المغربي الكريم بالخير والرفاهية، وعلى الأمة العربية والإسلامية باليمن والبركات”.

content: วันที่ 16 มิ.ย.2567 สํานักงานคณะกรรมการการเลือกตั้ง รายงานการเลือกสมาชิกวุฒิสภาระดับจังหวัด ที่จัดขึ้นในวันที่ 16 มิ.ย. สรุปจํานวนผู้ได้รับเลือกระดับจังหวัดไประดับประเทศ จํานวน 3,000 ราย โดยเป็นชาย 2,164 คน และเป็นหญิง 836 คน หลังจากผู้ได้รับเลือกระดับจังหวัดในรอบแรก การเลือกกันเองภายในกลุ่มสาขาอาชีพ จํานวน 7,000 คน ซึ่งเป็นชาย 4,861 คน และเป็นหญิง 2,139 คน อ่านข่าว : กกต.แถลงภาพรวม เลือก สว.ระดับจังหวัด ฉลุย มีคําร้อง 80 เรื่อง โดยจากจํานวนผู้ได้รับเลือกระดับอําเภอแล้วมาเลือกในระดับจังหวัด...

title: Selección de Costa Rica dejó a la vista un detalle importante al marcharse para la Copa América
content: Las sonrisas mandaron en la salida de la Selección de Costa Rica rumbo a Los Ángeles. Foto: Prensa Fedefútbol La Selección de Costa Rica partió este domingo rumbo a Los Ángeles, California, con miras a lo que será su debut en la Copa América 2024, certamen en el que debutará el 24 de junio en esa ciudad. title: 9 wounded in shooting at splash pad in Michigan
content: 9 wounded in shooting at splash pad in Michigan At least nine people, including two children, were wounded when a man opened fire at a splash pad in the Detroit suburb of Rochester Hills. The gunman, identified as 42-year-old Michael William Nash, died by suicide. CBS Chicago's Charlie De Mar reports.

title: Evacúan a unas 1.200 personas por un incendio forestal a las afueras de Los Ángeles
creator: EFE
content: Unas 1.200 personas fueron evacuadas este fin de semana a las afueras de Los Ángeles (California, EE UU) por un forestal que se propagó rápidamente debido a los fuertes vientos, informaron este domingo medios locales. El incendio, del que solo se ha contenido el 2%, (4.941 hectáreas) y obligado, ante su avance, al cierre de la reserva Pyramid Lake a los visitantes. title: Blanco lanza en grande en triunfo de Astro sobre Tigres
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, HOUSTON.- El dominicano Ronel Blanco consiguió su segunda apertura sin hits en su corta carrera en las Grandes Ligas, pero fue retirado luego de siete episodios en el triunfo de los Astros de Houston sobre los Tigres de Detroit, 4-1 el domingo. title: 916 Patiala range cops transferred
content: Patiala: The senior superintendents of this police range have in a major reshuffle in their districts transferred 916 cops from constables to inspectors — 537 in Patiala, 188 in Sangrur, 118 in Barnala, and 73 in Malerkotla. Apart from this, many ASIs and inspectors covered under the transfer policy were shifted to other districts within the Patiala range, while some were recommended for outside postings. title: Israel mantiene secuestrados a 9.300 palestinos

content: Foto: WAFA Más de 3.400 civiles están injustamente sometidos al estatus de procedimiento administrativo, sin cargos y sin que su defensa tenga acceso a las supuestas pruebas incriminatorias. content: Chandigarh: AAP spokesperson and Anandpur Sahib MP Malwinder Singh Kang on Sunday slammed Punjab BJP president Sunil Jakhar for never questioning the saffron party leaders, who, he said, were out to defame Punjab, for their “anti-Punjab actions”. title: Telescopio James Webb muestra como luce una estrella joven rodeada de carbón molecular
content: Uno de los más importantes dispositivos de la época reciente que han permitido descubrir los detalles que esconde el espacio exterior es el telescopio James Webb , gracias al cual organismos como la Administración Nacional de Aeronáutica y el Espacio (NASA) han podido compartir las imágenes de diversos fenómenos astronómicos como sucedió recientemente. creator: The Associated Press
content: GLENNVILLE, Ga. (AP) — An inmate used a gun to kill a kitchen worker at a Georgia prison early Sunday before fatally shooting himself, state officials said. The Georgia Department of Corrections in a statement said it’s investigating the deaths at Smith State Prison in rural southeast Georgia. title: Per Fahrrad im Zauber des Moments: Eindrücke am Seine-Radweg
content: Rouen - Keine Frage, der kleine Ort Poses am linken Seine-Ufer ist das neue Giverny. Da ist sich Landschaftsmalerin Michèle Ratel aus Poses ganz sicher: "Heute würde sich Monet hier niederlassen, die Kulisse ist doch viel impressionistischer und weniger überlaufen." Anders als Giverny in der Jetztzeit: In der 500-Einwohner-Gemeinde, 75 Kilometer nordwestlich von gelegen, lebte Monet (1840 bis 1926) über 40 Jahre. Er wirkte und starb dort. title: Christian Walker, Diamondbacks put up big numbers against White Sox
creator: Field Level Media
content: Christian Walker had three hits, including a solo home run, and drove in three runs to help the host Arizona Diamondbacks to a 12-5 win against the Chicago White Sox in the rubber game of their three-game series on Sunday afternoon in Phoenix. Jake McCarthy also drove in three runs, Joc Pederson had two RBIs and Corbin Carroll scored twice for Arizona, which has won three of four games. title: Jorge Soler helps Giants steamroll Angels
creator: Field Level Media
content: Jorge Soler contributed a three-run home run to a nine-run fourth inning, Spencer Bivens recorded a win in his major-league debut and the San Francisco Giants overcame another injury to their starting staff to beat the Los Angeles Angels 13-6 on Sunday afternoon.
