title: Três pessoas são assassinadas em intervalo de sete dias em cidade da Bahia que não registrava homicídios há mais de um ano
content: O caso mais recente é de um homem de 54 anos, que foi morto a golpes de arma branca, no sábado (15). De acordo com a Polícia Civil, a vítima foi identificada como Francisco dos Santos da Silva. Ele e o suspeito faziam uso de bebida alcoólica, quando se desentenderam e houve o ataque. O suspeito, de 43 anos, que fugiu após o crime, já foi identificado e é procurado pela Polícia Civil. A motivação e circunstâncias do crime estão sendo apuradas pela delegacia de Tanquinho. title: Detienen en Molina a uno de los involucrados en millonario robo a joyería de Curicó
content: Este domingo, el Ministerio Público comunicó la detención de uno de los individuos involucrados en el millonario robo a una joyería emplazada en una céntrica zona de la comuna de Curicó, Región del Maule. title: В Мурманской области создадут Центр защиты китов после спасения кита
content: В Мурманской области создадут центр защиты китов, заявил глава региона Андрей Чибис в телеграм-канале . Об этом он сообщил после операции по спасению краснокнижного кита в Баренцевом море. Ранее спасатели помогли запутавшемуся в сетях краснокнижному горбатому киту около села Териберка в Кольском районе. Операция по спасению млекопитающего шла два часа. title: Calgary explores using interim pipes to move water from Bearspaw plant
creator: Carolyn Kury de Castillo
content: Calgary officials are looking to explore other ways to move water from the Bearspaw Water Treatment Plant to get around the catastrophic feeder main break that has crippled the city’s water distribution system. The Bearspaw Water Treatment plant draws water from the Bow River. From there, it goes to underground storage reservoirs. But the break of the feeder main has immobilized the flow of 60 per cent of the city’s treated water. Calgary Mayor Jyoti Gondek told reporters at a press conference...

creator: Kaitlyn Offer
content: Former AFL chief executive Gillon McLachlan has been announced as the new boss of Tabcorp, earning at least $1.5 million a year plus bonuses. Mr McLachlan will become managing director and chief executive on August 5, Tabcorp said in a statement to the ASX on Monday. He will act in an observer capacity until the regulatory approvals are made. Mr McLachlan left the AFL in 2023 after a decade in the top job. title: Botafogo vence Grêmio com gols de Cuiabano e Júnior Santos, e retoma liderança do Brasileirão
content: O dinâmico Brasileirão de 2024 tem um novo líder na 9a rodada. Jogando contra o Grêmio em Cariacica (ES), o Botafogo venceu por 2 a 1 e retomou a ponta do campeonato, credenciado pela boa fase de Cuiabano e Júnior Santos, autores dos gols alvinegros. Gustavo Nunes marcou para o tricolor. A equipe de Artur Jorge chegou a 19 pontos e ultrapassou Flamengo e Bahia, que empataram neste domingo. O próximo desafio será contra o quarto colocado Athletico, no Nilton Santos, às 19h da próxima...

title: Israel’s army to pause daytime fighting on Gaza route to help flow of aid
creator: Josef Federman, Wafaa Shurafa and Lee Keath The Associated Press
content: JERUSALEM — Israel’s military announced on Sunday that it would pause fighting during daytime hours along a route in southern Gaza to free up a backlog of humanitarian aid deliveries. The army said that the daily “tactical pause,” which applies to about 71⁄2 mile of road in the Rafah area, would begin at 8 a.m. and last until 7 p.m. and continue until further notice. Сегодня полк уверенно продвигается вперед на времевском направлении. title: Muss der Arbeitgeber wissen, warum ich krankgeschrieben bin?
content: Viele Arbeitgeber akzeptieren Krankmeldungen ohne Nachfragen. Andere zweifeln sie an oder erkundigen sich nach dem Grund. Doch was muss ich meinem Chef über meinen Gesundheitszustand erzählen? Manch ein Arbeitgeber ist bei Krankschreibungen vielleicht neugieriger, als er sein sollte. Auch wenn Beschäftigte bisweilen schon von sich aus mitteilen, warum sie krank sind, besteht dazu eigentlich gar keine Pflicht. title: Despite improved WHO regulations, the world remains ill-prepared for the next pandemic
creator: Michael Baker University of Otago, Alexander Gillespie University of Waikato
content: OPINION The international community’s recent failure to conclude a global pandemic agreement leaves large gaps in our capacity to deal with the next major infectious disease emergency. The risk of another pandemic like Covid — the worst in a century — is increasing. The World Health Organisation (WHO) took an important step by adopting useful revisions to the legally binding International Health Regulations. But, while this advance is something to celebrate, it is not enough. Even if...

title: Bryson DeChambeau wins another U.S. Open with a clutch finish to deny Rory McIlroy
creator: The Associated Press
content: By DOUG FERGUSON PINEHURST, N.C. — Bryson DeChambeau won the U.S. Open on June 16 for the second time with the best shot of his life for another memorable finish on the 18th hole at Pinehurst No. 2 — and another heavy dose of heartache for Rory McIlroy. GS리테일은 ‘함께 더 재미있는 유어스’라는 새로운 슬로건 아래 브랜드 체계를 재정립하고 아이덴티티(정체성)를 강화한다는 방침이다. 유어스는 GS리테일이 지난 2016년 3월 ‘함박웃음’ 이후 17년 만에 선보인 통합 PB 브랜드다. 8년만에 이뤄진 이번 BI 리뉴얼은 유어스만의 브랜드 자산 가치를 높이는 데 주력했다. 먼저 BI를 기본형, 프리미엄형 2종으로 구성해 체계적인...

Already out of reckoning for the Super Eight round, Sri Lanka’s pride will be at stake given it has had a tournament to forget, marred with multiple issues on and off the field. For the Scott Edwards-led Netherlands team, there will be a great deal of motivation to bring out their best and hope for a big win as well as luck to favour them. title: Xi Jinping acusa a EEUU de empujar a China a una guerra
creator: Eseditor
content: «Xi Jinping advirtió a la presidenta de la Comisión Europea, Ursula von der Leyen, de que Washington intentó provocar a Pekín para que atacara Taiwán», escribe el periódico citando fuentes bien informadas. Xi Jinping subrayó que «no cayó en la trampa», indicó uno de los interlocutores. Otra fuente añadió que el Jefe de Estado chino advirtió a sus funcionarios sobre tales acciones estadounidenses. A su vez, ni la Embajada china en Washington ni un portavoz de Von der Leyen hicieron...

My Boyfriend Dumped Me Immediately He Made Money
creator: Ngozi Uma
content: Morenike’s relationship was once filled with love and assurance, even though her boyfriend was broke. However, as soon as he started making money, he stopped showing her affection. Despite noticing the changes, Morenike never stopped loving him. She clung to the faint hope that he would love her again as he did before becoming rich. “We were so much in love with each other, or so I thought. We became lovers at a very young age. title: Dutton snatches preferred PM lead in Resolve poll as draft redistributions finished
creator: Adrian Beaumont, Election Analyst (Psephologist) at The Conversation; and Honorary Associate, School of Mathematics and Statistics, The University of Melbourne
content: A national Resolve poll for Nine newspapers, conducted June 11–15 from a sample of 1,607, gave the Coalition 36% of the primary vote (steady since the May post-budget Resolve poll), Labor 28% (down one), the Greens 14% (up two), One Nation 6% (down one), the UAP 1% (down one), independents 11% (down one) and others 4% (up two). Resolve doesn’t usually give a two party estimate, but applying 2022 preference flows to this poll would give Labor about a 51–49 lead, unchanged since May. This is...

title: Video: NFL Legend Tom Brady Makes Fox Sports Debut During 2024 UFL Championship Game
creator: Doric Sam
content: Ahead of his first full year as a broadcaster, legendary quarterback Tom Brady got his feet wet on Sunday. Brady made his debut in the booth during Sunday's UFL Championship Game between the Birmingham Stallions and San Antonio Brahmas on Fox. He joined Curt Menefee and Joel Klatt during the second quarter when the game was scoreless and provided some insight, imploring the offenses to get going. "They're all a little different. You get into these games and there's a lot of defense out there...

title: ECB's Kazaks says must not allow inflation to remain above 2% into 2026
content: (ECB) Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said on Sunday that the bank must not allow inflation to remain above 2% into 2026, adding that he is concerned about delays beyond this. Key quotes “Currently I think we are still on the path to 2% in the second half of 2025, and I would really hope that we would do it by that time.” “We should not drag this problem into 2026.” “If data show that reaching our target is being pushed out beyond 2025, then of course the restriction level needs to be...

title: Sebastián Hernández, el 'profe' de Primaria que dejó las aulas para ser el mejor muralista mundial
content: Un caminante pasea por las soleadas calles de Santiago de la Ribera y al llegar a la plaza Virgen de la Fuensanta, se percata de los colores vivos que se plasman en el suelo. El viandante se sube a un banco para apreciar con más claridad la curiosa figura que conforman esos trazos y logra apreciar la bailarina que se dibuja bajo sus pies. Ese caminante es Sebastián Hernández Díaz (Murcia, 1990), conocido artísticamente como Sbah y es el autor de este mural de 800 metros cuadrados . Sbah es...

content: Patna: Firebrand BJP neta and Union textiles minister Giriraj Singh on Sunday said goats should not be sacrificed in public places on the occasion of Bakrid , a prominent festival of Muslims. title: Consternación en Aguachica: investigan muertes de dos personas en menos de 48 horas
creator: Periodista
content: La comunidad de Aguachica, Cesar, se encuentra consternada por dos trágicos sucesos registrados en los últimos dos días, donde dos hombres fueron hallados muertos en esta localidad. El primer hecho se registró el pasado sábado 15 de junio cuando un hombre identificado como Oscar Perdomo Rodríguez, de 59 años, quien al parecer se encontraba en estado de depresión por deudas y fue hallado sin vida al interior de su residencia situada en el barrio La Sabanita. title: «Ростов» подпишет контракт с Кучаевым по схеме «1+2»
content: «Ростов» достиг договоренности о трансфере полузащитника Константина Кучаева, сообщает «РБ Спорт». По данным источника, 26-летний россиянин перейдет в команду на правах свободного агента и подпишет контракт по схеме «1+2». Первую часть сезона-2023/24 Кучаев провел в ЦСКА, во второй половине сезона футболист выступал за «Пари НН» на правах аренды. Хавбек сделал 1 результативную передачу в 26 матчах во всех турнирах в прошлом сезоне.

title: French, Swiss Finance Firms Top Europe Charts for Boardroom Political Links
content: (Bloomberg) -- French and Swiss finance firms are more likely to have former politicians as board members than their European peers, underscoring the close links between policy making and the world of money in the two nations, an Ernst & Young study showed. A third of financial services companies headquartered in Switzerland and 30% of firms in France have at least one board member with ministerial or parliamentary experience. That compares with just 14% of German firms, 13% of Italian firms...

title: Los hosteleros se quejan por falta de personal y yo he buscado trabajo de camarera: mi experiencia
content: Sucedía hace unas semanas: la asociación de hosteleros de Cantabria lanzaba una convocatoria para ofrecer trabajo a los más de 7.000 demandantes de empleo de la comunidad autónoma, y acudían sólo 70 . title: Landslide in Ecuador kills at least six, 30 others missing
creator: The Straits Times
content: QUITO - A landslide in Ecuador killed at least six people and left 30 others missing, according to preliminary information from Ecuadorian authorities on Sunday. The "large-magnitude" landslide occurred in the center of the country in the city of Banos de Agua Santa, the Ecuadorean Secretariat for Risk Management said in a report. title: Karrinyup stabbing: Two 16-year-old boy’s charged over stabbing attack on 18-year-old men
creator: Phil Hickey
content: Two teenagers have been charged over a stabbing attack in Karrinyup that left two men with critical injuries. Mirrabooka detectives have charged the boys — both aged 16 — with one count each of aggravated armed robbery and two counts of grievous bodily harm after the incident unfolded about 2.30pm on Sunday. title: Amateur football: Willmar Mud Dawgs shut out by Mountain Lake Lakers
creator: Michael Lyne
content: MOUNTAIN LAKE — The Mountain Lake Lakers routed the Willmar Mud Dawgs to remain undefeated in the Southern Plains Football League on Saturday. Mountain Lake earned a 40-0 shutout victory over the Mud Dawgs. The Lakers are 6-0 in the Western Conference and Willmar is 0-6. The Mud Dawgs next play host to the Buffalo Ridge Wildcats at 2 p.m. Saturday at the Willmar Civic Center turf field.

title: City police arrest four involved in attempted highway robbery
content: Coimbatore/ Kochi: The Coimbatore police on Sunday arrested four people who were part of a gang that waylaid a Kerala-bound car and attempted to attack three passengers with weapons on the Salem–Kochi highway in the early hours of June 14. The incident happened around 200 metres before a toll plaza near Madukkarai. title: Wetterdienst warnt vor «extremer Hitze» in den USA
content: Bis Ende der Woche sollen in vielen Teilen der USA Temperaturrekorde gebrochen werden. In Kalifornien gibt es bereits Waldbrände. title: With fickle weather, prices of oxen in NK double in 3 mths
creator: Sangamesh Menasinakai
content: Hubballi: Reeling under intense heatwave with weathermen forecasting a longer dry spell, hundreds of distressed farmers sold their cows and oxen at Rs 40,000 to Rs 60,000 per pair in Feb-March this year. With the onset of monsoon which has revived agriculture activities in North Karnataka in early June, farmers are now struggling to buy a pair of oxen, whose prices have breached Rs 1.2 lakh. title: США, Южная Корея и Япония могут подписать соглашение по борьбе с ядерной угрозой
content: НЬЮ-ЙОРК, 17 июня. /ТАСС/. Вашингтон, Сеул и Токио могут вскоре подписать трехстороннее соглашение о сотрудничестве в сфере безопасности для борьбы "с ядерной угрозой со стороны КНДР". title: Prorrogada vacinação contra a paralisia infantil até o final de junho
content: A secretaria de Saúde, do governo do Estado, prorrogou a campanha nacional de vacinação contra a poliomielite até o final de junho para os 645 municípios. O público-alvo são as crianças de 1 a 4 anos. Já as menores de 1 ano, será avaliada a situação vacinal, iniciando ou completando a caderneta de acordo com a idade. title: Some Russians make the cut for Paris Olympics but others fail vetting process
content: The first batch of Russian and Belarusian athletes have been cleared to compete at next month's Paris Olympics, with a total of 25 making the cut but others failing an International Olympic Committee vetting process over the war in Ukraine, the IOC said on Saturday. title: Jorge Soler helps Giants steamroll Angels
creator: Field Level Media
content: Jorge Soler contributed a three-run home run to a nine-run fourth inning, Spencer Bivens recorded a win in his major-league debut and the San Francisco Giants overcame another injury to their starting staff to beat the Los Angeles Angels 13-6 on Sunday afternoon. The victory came after the Giants had to scratch scheduled starter Kyle Harrison, who sprained his right ankle working out in the team's weight room on Saturday. title: What is Juneteenth and what does it celebrate?
creator: Trevor Myers
content: SALT LAKE CITY ( ABC4 ) — You have heard the name of this holiday before — but what exactly is Juneteenth, and what does it celebrate? In short, Juneteenth is a holiday commemorating the last enslaved people in the United States learning of their freedom after the Civil War. The holiday, which occurs every year on June 19, only became a federal holiday in 2021 — but its roots date back to the 1860s. The name “Juneteenth” combines the words “June” and “nineteenth,” but other names for the...

content: با توجه به گسترش علم و فناوری، تلفن ثابت به عنوان یکی از ضروری‌ترین وسایل ارتباطی محسوب می‌شود. اما با توجه به رشد روزافزون وسایل ارتباطی برخی از نقاط کشورمان هستند که از داشتن آن محروم هستند. شهروندخبرنگار ما که ساکن روستای قدیم آباد از توابع شهرستان البرز استان قزوین است 2 سال گذشته خط تلفن ثابت را خریداری کرده است، اما هیچ اقدامی تا کنون برای نصب آن صورت نگرفته است. شهروندخبرنگار ما با ارسال پیامی خواستار رسیدگی به اینگونه مشکلات شد. متن پیام شهروندخبرنگار سلام من ساکن روستای قدیم آباد...

title: Dignitat, modèstia
creator: Claude Benet
content: Sempre he defensat que Andorra ha de mostrar dues qualitats essencials per ser respectada arreu: modèstia perquè som petits i no és assenyat anar traient pit, però alhora dignitat, precisament perquè pel fet de ser petits no ens hem de deixar trepitjar. Malauradament, aquestes dues característiques no formen part del dia a dia del nostre petit i emblemàtic país, més aviat les hem reemplaçat per altres característiques com són la supèrbia, l’ostentació, l’exuberància i fins i tot...

title: 太平洋側 18日にかけ激しい雨の恐れ
content: 太平洋側、激しい雨の恐れ 土砂災害に警戒呼びかけ、気象庁 前線や低気圧の影響で、西日本から東日本の太平洋側と南西諸島では18日にかけて雷を伴った非常に激しい雨が降る恐れがあるとして、気象庁は17日、土砂災害や浸水、河川の氾濫への警戒と、落雷や竜巻などの激しい突風に注意を呼びかけた。

Вячеслав Франк надеется, что генплан развития Барнаула утвердят до конца года
content: Глава Барнаула Вячеслав Франк надеется, что генеральный план развития города примут до конца 2024 года. Об этом он рассказал журналисту amic.ru. Именно этот документ позволит понять, как развивать краевую столицу до 2036 года. Еще в марте первый заместитель главы администрации Барнаула Андрей Федоров утверждал, что в настоящее время уже идет размещение барнаульского генплана в федеральной государственной информационной системе. title: Rory McIlroy’s 10-year curse continues after final-hole choke hands Bryson DeChambeau second US Open title
content: Poor Rory McIlroy. The Northern Irish star’s 10-year curse has continued, missing a decisive putt on the final hole at the US Open to deny himself the chance at a first major since 2014. America’s Bryson DeChambeau finished six-under to win his second US Open title at Pinehurst on Monday morning AEST, bettering McIlroy by one shot. McIlroy will be left to rue a sloppy end to his final round, which included three bogeys in the last four holes — but it was the botched two-foot, four-inches putt...

title: ソーラー飛行機が「離陸」する日 - WSJ発
creator: The Wall Street Journal
content: 軽量で地上から手で飛ばせる飛行機に、成層圏に集合する飛行機。太陽エネルギーのみを動力とするそんな飛行機を想像してみてほしい。 太陽エネルギーによる飛行を実現に近づけるこうした飛行機の開発が進んでいる。これらの飛行機が果す役割は現在のジェット機とは大きく異なる。 ソーラー飛行機が旅客輸送に使用されることは当面ないだろう。しかし業界幹部によると、試作品――そのほとんどは無人で動く――から、リスクの高い任務での空からの監視や被災地域の緊急通信のための新たな選択肢が生まれるかもしれない。

title: Govt plans revenue tribunals to resolve land issues quickly
creator: Koride Mahesh
content: Hyderabad: In a bid to resolve land issues quickly, the state govt is planning to set up revenue tribunals at the level of officers. Also, the govt is mulling over bringing a single comprehensive land Act in place of more than 100 various revenue Acts, some of which are now obsolete. title: Evacuation warnings issued as Hesperia wildfire grows to more than 1,300 acres
creator: KABC
content: HESPERIA, Calif. (KABC) -- Evacuation warnings are in place in Hesperia after a fast-growing wildfire exploded in size. The fire was reported just after 6 p.m. Saturday along Highway 173. Since then, the fire has more than tripled in size - jumping from 300 acres to about 1,330. Evacuation warnings include homes in the Arrowhead Equestrian Estates area. As Sunday morning, the fire was just 7% contained. Firefighters continue to battle the blaze from the ground and the air.

Police said Nithyanandam got trapped in weeds in the waterbody while he was swimming and drowned. Onlookers immediately informed the fire and rescue personnel. title: 台東刮焚風飆36°C 午後中部以北與山區小心雷陣雨
content: 週一上班日,中央氣象署提醒,受到 西南風 沉降影響,今天(17日)台東縣地區有 焚風 發生的機率,有連續出現攝氏36度高溫的機率,請民眾務必注意。目前在日本南方海面的滯留 鋒面 ,向西南西延伸,西半部清晨至上午時段易有短暫雨,午後中部以北與山區必須留意 雷陣雨 。 氣象署表示,在台灣北方的鋒面接近北部海面,雖然不至於南壓台灣本島,但仍帶來部分水氣移入,因此清晨至上午時段,西半部地區將有零星短暫陣雨,午後中部以北、東半部與各山區則可能有局部短暫雷陣雨,甚至有較大雨勢發生。 尤其是金門與馬祖首當其衝,將有短暫陣雨或雷雨,馬祖並有局部較大雨勢發生的機率。至於台灣本島各地與澎湖,則大多是多雲到晴的天氣。 除了上午西半部地區有零星短暫陣雨外,午後中部以北、東北部、東部地區與其他山區,則須注意將有局部短暫雷陣雨,民眾出門最好準備雨具。 此外,馬祖與金門易有低雲或局部霧影響能見度;東南部地區有焚風發生機率;綠島、蘭嶼、馬祖,還有新竹以北沿海空曠地區易有較強陣風。

creator: The Associated Press
content: SANTA ANA, Calif.—A victim whose skull was found by children in a Southern California city in 1983 has been identified 41 years after her remains were first discovered, authorities said. The Orange County Sheriff’s Department identified the victim Friday as Maritza Glean Grimmett, a Panamanian native who moved to the U.S. in the late 1970s. Grimmett was 20 years old at the time of her disappearance, authorities said in a news release. The investigation involved a DNA analysis using Grimmett’s...

title: Panchkula News: तारों का बंडल चोरी करने वाला आरोपी गिरफ्तार
content: पंचकूला। सेक्टर-10 के एक घर से तारों का बंडल चोरी करने वाले युवक को पुलिस ने गिरफ्तार कर लिया है। गिरफ्तार युवक का नाम सोनू है। वह सेक्टर-4 हरिपुर का रहने वाला है। सेक्टर-10 निवासी अरुण कुमार ने सेक्टर-5 थाने में दी शिकायत में बताया कि उनकी प्रिंटिंग प्रेस का काम है। उनके घर में लकड़ी का काम चल रहा था। उसके लिए उन्होंने सोनू को काम पर रखा था। 13 जून को किसी कारणवश उन्हें दिल्ली जाना पड़ा। 14 जून को वापस आने पर देखा तो तारों का बंडल गायब है। इसके बाद सीसीटीवी फुटेज चेक किया तो उसमें सोनू तारों...

title: Lukewarm response to online pet licensing in Tambaram
creator: Preetika P
content: Chennai: Tambaram Corporation ’s pet licence programme is yet to pick up pace. Only 317 licences have been issued since the online pet licence portal was launched on May 23. The corporation’s health department aimed to issue around 2,000 licences in its first phase. So far, the department has received 503 online applications for pet licences. The corporation has set June 20 as the last day to apply for pet licences. Officials are hopeful that applications may increase in the coming days....

title: NH證 "LG생활건강, 하반기 中 실적 회복 추세...투자의견·목표가 상향"
creator: 장수영
content: [사진=LG생활건강] NH투자증권은 17일 LG생활건강에 대해 2분기 실적이 시장 기대치에 부합할 것으로 예상했다. 주가 재평가 여력이 있다며 투자의견을 '매수'로, 목표주가를 42만원에서 50만원으로 상향 조정했다. 정지윤 연구원은 "2분기 연결 기준 매출액은 1조7841억원, 영업이익 1537억원으로 컨센서스 영업이익 1585억원에 부합할 전망"이라고 밝혔다. 정 연구원은 "2분기를 지나면 대중국 실적은 완연한 회복 추세에 접어들...

title: Rishikesh News: रेलवे सुरंग निर्माण के दौरान कर्मचारी की मौत, सात अधिकारियों पर केस
content: ऋषिकेश-कर्णप्रयाग ब्राडगेज रेल लाइन की सुरंग निर्माण दौरान कौडियाला स्थित रेलवे प्रोजेक्ट पैकेज-3 में काम कर रहे तीन कर्मचारी घायल हो गए थे। उनमें से एक कर्मचारी मौत हो गई। कर्मचारी के भाई की तहरीर पर थाना मुनि की रेती पुलिस ने सुरंग निर्माण में लगी नवयुगा कंपनी के साइट इंजीनियर, ठेकेदार सहित सात अधिकारियों के खिलाफ मुकदमा दर्ज किया है। चमोली के जोशीमठ (ज्योतिर्मठ) तहसील निवासी वेद प्रकाश पुत्र मथुरा प्रसाद ने थाना मुनि की रेती में लिखित तहरीर दी। इसमें बताया कि 10 जून को उनके चचेरे भाई कमलेश...

title: Trumpworld Trots Out Another ‘Cheap Fake’ Video of President Biden
creator: Brett Bachman
content: Less than a week after being derided for using a deceptively edited clip of President Joe Biden to suggest that he “wandered off” during a G7 economic summit in Italy, right-wing pundits and media outlets—including Rupert Murdoch’s New York Post —published another round of stories featuring a similarly edited clip of the president, this time in an attempt to smear the 81-year-old for “freezing” up while on stage at a fundraiser.
